Quote.Text: Avec mes Gunnar je vois comme à travers d'un pot de pisse.

Quote.Author: Adelscott

Quote.Author: Adelscott
Quote.Reference: Stream
Quote.Text: J'ai l'impression qu'il y a moins de thune sur cette map [Akilon Flats]

Quote.Text: Je n'arrive jamais à trouver un endroit avec des conditions parfaites pour jouer

Quote.Author: Adelscott
Quote.Reference: Stream
Quote.Text: Oh Merde j'ai pas de gaz… Bon ben tampis pour l'upgrade.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Marines stimming with no medivac support, casting at IPL, 2011
Quote.Text: These must be americans, because there's no health insurance for these guys!

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Protoss tutorial part 1, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Be safe: always, always, always wear a cannon.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: GoOdy in a nutshell, MLG Winter Qualifiers, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: [GoOdy] You know what's coming, but you cannot stop it.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: On Stephano's earnings and retiring from eSports to study, SCAN#4
Quote.Text: This guy [Stephano] could buy anything, he could probably buy his exam results to be honest.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG Anaheim 2012
Quote.Text: I dont know how he does it but he [MarineKing] splits like Moses to avoid these storms.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Pearl of Starcraft philosophy casting TSL4 Qualifiers, Jul 2012
Quote.Text: It's always good to do something with something.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting TSL4 online semi-finals
Quote.Text: I am wearing my TSL4 T-shirt, although casting naked is actually pretty good.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting DreamHack Valencia 2012
Quote.Text: The first rule as Protoss: DO-NOT-LET-CRAP into your main base.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: As popularized by Apollo during SC2WCS EU Grand Finals and DHVLC 2012
Quote.Text: The ticking bomb is ticking!

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting WhiteRa Celebrity Gamer Challenge
Quote.Text: I don't know how to cheese. I tried cheesing once, ended up expanding.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting Naniwa vs Flash (2-1) - Group B Round 4 at MLG Dallas 2012
Quote.Text: You have to believe in God [Flash]. Especially you Americans, it says so on your money.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Life goes down to Flash (2-0) and then has a sick come back in the extended series (2-4) - MLG Dallas 2012
Quote.Text: Some might say Life's life Flash-ed before his eyes there.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Coach Apollo speaks to his disciples on facebook
Quote.Text: If you think SC gets too hard.. its a hard game, in all honesty it becomes easier the more you play because you learn, you become faster, you know what you need to do before it even happens. If you play 1-2 games and then stop, you will never progress. Be brave and challenge yourself.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: MINDGAMES - Apollo's first streaming session of 2013
Quote.Text: I told him I'm going to build an oracle, so he'll think I won't build an oracle, but I WILL build an oracle: MINDGAMES!

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: The truth about vipers - on twitter
Quote.Text: Vipers are just lonely units wanting hugs.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Apollo to Nathanias, pre-game chat during Dreamhack Summer Day 1
Quote.Text: I use StarCraft terminology everywhere: like if we were going to a Bar you would be my scouting SCV, to check out if it's a good location.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting Dayshi vs DuckDeok G3 - WCS EU Ro32 Group D
Quote.Text: If he loses to another 4 gate... I think that is the definition of going full foreigner.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: The tough life of a caster - WCS Europe Premier League S2 Ro32 group G
Quote.Text: Sometimes some words come out of my mouth and they don't really make sense, but that's the job I have. It's a struggle I've been living with for a long time and I continue to do so

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting DH Open Bucarest 2013 Day 1
Quote.Text: Day9: "I don't know how to do an Artosis impersonation."\nApollo: "You just gotta complain about a lot of things!"

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS EU S3 Premier League Finals
Quote.Text: Sometimes when I cast Starcraft my body gets excited and weird noises come out.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: As Thorzain goes down 0-2 vs Taeja in the DreamHack 2014 Opening Showmatch
Quote.Text: Maddelisk: "What would you do if you were in Thorzain's shoes now?"\nApollo: "I'd play Protoss."

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Reaper vs Reaper between Major vs Bbyong at IEM Sao Paulo
Quote.Text: It's 4v4, no 3v4... now 3v3. I feel like I'm commentating on counter strike, a head shot could end the game!

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting Happy vs Mana G2 - IEM Katowice EU Qualifier
Quote.Text: Be safe or be sorry, always wear a turret!

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Casting Happy vs Bly - WCS Europe Ro32
Quote.Text: Kaelaris: "I don't even know how to commentate these engagements."\nApollo: "Just go RAAAAAAHHHH, everything's dying!"

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: MVP makes it through WCS EU Ro32
Quote.Text: I've touched the four pins, he's a god.

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Apollo to TLO during San vs Golden - WCS Europe Ro4
Quote.Text: A hidden Spire on the right side of the map, that's something TLO would do! Wait... YOU ARE TLO! THAT'S SOMETHING YOU WOULD DO!

Quote.Author: Apollo
Quote.Reference: Explaining Jjakji's early lead at IEM
Quote.Text: Jjakji doesn't want to blow his load too early.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Announcing the birth of 'Artwosis' on GOMTV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: I wanna rule the world vicariously through a child.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: We have the GSL what do you have? The Superbowl? AHAH... no thanks!

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG Spring Arena #1, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: When you're fighting broodlings with your probes, you know it's time to leave.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Commenting the latest Naniwa controversy, SOTG EP67
Quote.Text: Here's a fun fact, you guys: NaNiwa actually is not a murderer.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis comments the stagnant state of current TvZ and welcomes the queen range increase, SC2 Dojo
Quote.Text: At this point, I can almost cast a TvZ without looking at the screen.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: SC2 according to Artosis, casting GSL S3 2012
Quote.Text: When your opponent attacks, defend. If he defends, expand. If he expands, attack.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: A gang of queens, casting JonnyREcco vs DeMusliM at SC2WCS UK 2012
Quote.Text: A bunch of mutalisks are called a flock, but what do you call a bunch of queens? I think we should call it a gang. A gang of queens.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Naniwa beats Genius and advances to Code S Ro8, GSL S3 2012
Quote.Text: He is both Worf and Riker. He is all Deanna Troi ever wanted all in one!

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Blowing minds at MLG Summer Arena 2012
Quote.Text: You can't spell Artosis without R-T-S. Literally, you actually can't.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis, beer in hand, explains his RPS philosophy after losing a Bo5 to CARMAC - IEM Cologne
Quote.Text: It's all about rock, man. People who go paper are fucking weak.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Byun vs Rain G2 - GSL S4 2012
Quote.Text: Well you know what Sun Tzu says: 'When macro player, sometimes cheese'.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting SC2WCS EU 2012
Quote.Text: Sweden is basically mini-Korea.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis explains how to all-in - GSL Code S S4 Ro16 2012
Quote.Text: Once you commit, you don't stop committing.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Taeja vs Leenock - Ro8 GSL Code S S4 2012
Quote.Text: You know, Tasteless, true in life and in Starcraft: you don't commit, you can't get hurt.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: MVP (vs Symbol) keeps winning despite his injury - Ro8 GSL Code S S4 2012
Quote.Text: You know what they say Tasteless: in Korea, nerves don't pinch MVP, MVP pinches nerves.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: MVP beats Rain and moves forward to the GSL Code S S4 Finals
Quote.Text: [MVP] is not stylistic, his style is winning, which is the style you want to have.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: From Artosis' response to #SaveHOTS
Quote.Text: SC2 is the best damn game in the world. Its more beautiful and complex than anything else being played at the moment. There is absolutely no RTS game on the horizon which could possibly knock it off its pedestal.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Maybe this one time Life solved the meaning of MVP - Life wins GSL S4 2012
Quote.Text: Many people, many religions, have tried to figure out the meaning of Life, and MVP solved it.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis teaches us about the ship that was built in the Antiga Shipyard - Taeja vs Polt G1, Ro32 GSL Code S S5 2012
Quote.Text: NesTea has a yacht so large, it displaces the ocean.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Luxury Archon Toilet - Hero vs Curious G2, Ro32 GSL Code S S5 2012
Quote.Text: That Archon toilet was so good, it had a bidet!

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: During Royal Roader ceremony in which Life is awarded with a huge bastard sword, Ro32 GSL Code S S5 Group H 2012
Quote.Text: People that say that video games promote violence are so stupid, I just wanna force-field them in a triangle and kill them with Colossus beams.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis solo casting GSL Code S Ro16 Group B
Quote.Text: Welcome back to the GSL, I am Artosis, and I am Tasteless-less.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting PartinG vs Sniper - GSL Code S Ro16 Group C
Quote.Text: In the words of Madonna: PartinG is like a virgin, his immortal push got held for the very first time.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: IEM Singapore 2012 semifinals
Quote.Text: sLivko is the brick wall Zerg and all the Protosses he plays against are crash test dummies.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Squirtle vs Nerchio in the GSLWC Finals - IPL5 Day3
Quote.Text: Tasteless: "I don't know why people go for Void Rays, you just fungal them."\nArtosis: "Isn't that the answer to everything?"

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Crazy multi-prong attack from Rain vs IdrA - Ro16 BWC Global Finals (18-Nov-2012)
Quote.Text: Rain just did a 5 pronged attack, there aren't even forks with that many prongs.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Tweet during GSL S1 2013 Up and Downs Group C
Quote.Text: There is nothing better than good StarCraft.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Team8.TY vs Startale.Curious G2 - Ro32 GSL Code S S1 Group B
Quote.Text: If Code S was a vodka, it would be a very expensive quadruple distilled vodka.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Taeja vs DRG G2 - 2013 GSL S1 Code S, Ro16, Group A (07-Feb-2013)
Quote.Text: Without infestors, what are broodlords but giant mutas that shoot out weak zerglings?

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting MC vs. Curious G2 - 2013 GSL S1 Code S, Ro16, Group C
Quote.Text: One phoenix is like the sound of one hand clapping, it's not very much.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis explains his curse, casting Taeja vs. Soulkey G5 - 2013 GSL S1 Code S, Ro8
Quote.Text: I am always right but sometimes things go wrong and people call it my curse.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: HotS vs WoL - SOTG EP86
Quote.Text: I couldn't see another Wings of Liberty game if you paid me now that I've seen Heart of the Swarm.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: On SOTG EP87
Quote.Text: That's how I derive happiness: playing StarCraft.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: On cultural differences between regions - SOTG EP86
Quote.Text: I played on the NA ladder for a while and the things that people do are to pick up ladder points, while the Koreans are training to be good.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Humble Dan on replay analysis while streaming
Quote.Text: You really have to detach yourself and accept that you suck at StarCraft. Like I suck at StarCraft and it's all I've done for 15 years.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Shine vs. Symbol - WCS Korea Season 1 Ro32 Group E
Quote.Text: 10 pool is the new black, it goes well with every style.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Innovation vs. Hyun G1 - WCS Korea Season 1 Ro32 Group F
Quote.Text: You think fixing the economy is hard? Listen Obama... I don't think so. Try to play TvZ like Innovation.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting HerO vs Hyun - DH Open Ro8 2013
Quote.Text: Hallucinated probes certainly have no soul.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Flying vs Soulkey - WCS Korean Ro16
Quote.Text: The sound of one phoenix lifting: an old Chinese proverb for silence.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Innovation beats RorO 3-0 in the WCS Korea GSL Ro8
Quote.Text: I don't think that TvZ is imbalanced but Innovation vs Z certainly is.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Soulkey defeats Innovation in the WCS Korea / GSL S1 Final
Quote.Text: Soulkey just did the hardest thing in the whole world: it's not being an astronaut, it's not being the president and balancing the economy, it's beating Innovation in a best of 7 in a GSL final.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Solo-casting TLO vs Stephano G1 - WCS Global Finals S1 Group A
Quote.Text: The scariest thing in the entire world for a solo caster is to encounter the pause in game.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Rain vs Hyvaa - WCS KR Ro16
Quote.Text: Did you know that Airtoss is actually an anagram of Artosis?

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Bomber vs Bbyong - WCS Korea Ro16
Quote.Text: This is how I measure people's skill in TvT: how many medivacs full of hellbats does Bomber need to kill you.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Hyvaa vs First - WCS KR Season 2, Ro16 Day 5
Quote.Text: The cheesiest thing a cheeser can do is play a macro game.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Stephano vs Stardust - DHOpen Valencia Group Stage #3 Group B
Quote.Text: The 7 Gate +1 attack isn't a girlfriend, it's a build with benefits.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Team Acer 'Grilled' EP61
Quote.Text: StarCraft is like a logic puzzle and art, all in one. I see beauty in it and I want to understand it more.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Innovation goes 0-4 vs Maru's one-base pushes in the WCS KR Season 2 Semifinals
Quote.Text: There is nothing more serious than a one-base all-in.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS S2 Global Finals
Quote.Text: Apollo: "Artosis, there is only one Pylon powering those 6 Gateways!"\nArtosis: "I believe they call that the Incontrol-Pylon."

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Scarlett vs Bomber - WCS S2 Global Finals
Quote.Text: The early Muta does not always get the Banshee.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Dream vs Bbyong G2 - WCS S3 Korea Challenger
Quote.Text: You know what they say? You can't stim a browned banana.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Flash vs Hyvaa - WCS Korea GSL Premier S3 Ro32 Group E
Quote.Text: Tasteless: "This is a roach-sandwich Artosis."\nArtosis: "That's true but sometimes the filling beats the bread!"

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Nerchio vs Life - DH Open Bucarest 2013 Day2
Quote.Text: The problem with rock-paper-scissors is that rock is just too strong. If your first 2-3 throws are not rock you're basically a cheeser.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS Korea S3 Ro16 Group D
Quote.Text: My goal one day: fiberoptic internet to the Korean ladder server from a little island in the Philippines where I live in a little hut. I'll play Starcraft and eat coconuts, that's it.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: META EP18
Quote.Text: When Terran hits the 'select all army button', does it select their SCVs

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: sOs goes up 2-0 in the WCS Global finals (BlizzCon) vs JaeDong cannon-rushing both games
Quote.Text: Maybe cannon-rushes are the way to go, maybe the NA server got it right.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Deep truths are uncovered - sometime during Blizzcon
Quote.Text: Phoenixes are even more useless against Ultras than Sentrys are.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis gets married - from twitter
Quote.Text: Life goal accomplished: walked down isle to sc1 Terran theme.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Hot6 Cup
Quote.Text: Mech and my baby, those are my favorite things.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Sound PvZ advice, casting Parting vs True - WCS Korea Season 1 Group E
Quote.Text: When in doubt, build more roaches.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS Korea S1 Ro32 Group C
Quote.Text: A bullet in Starcraft's head would still be better than 15 Protoss in the round of 16.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Socke vs Hyun - SeatStoryCup Group A
Quote.Text: Whenever you find yourself warping in only Stalkers without Blink, you know that you're dead.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting SeatStory Cup
Quote.Text: Where there is a SwarmHost, there is a way.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Katowice
Quote.Text: He is a Protoss, lasers come naturally to him.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Jjakji vs Revival at IEM Katowice
Quote.Text: Swarm Host/Muta has more gas than German water.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting Jjakji vs Revival at IEM Katowice
Quote.Text: Could this be MECH? If so, this would MECH me very happy.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting DH Open
Quote.Text: The best defense is a good defense.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting DH Open
Quote.Text: I feel like he's having a mid-Life crisis right now.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Ro32 Group G
Quote.Text: Those immortals would have killed all the roaches and cured cancer by now, if it were Parting's.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Season 2 Ro32 Group H
Quote.Text: Oh my God this is a babality! Innovation turned squirtle into a baby!

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Season 2 Ro32 Group H
Quote.Text: Squirtle is mulch in the garden of Innovation's Terran.

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Season 2 Ro16 Group D
Quote.Text: Tasteless: "There's no cannon. THERE'S NO CANNON! Where's the cannon?"\nArtosis: "There is no cannon, you just said it yourself."

Quote.Author: Artosis
Quote.Reference: Artosis shows true colours at DH Open
Quote.Text: I don't think Overlords should fly.

Quote.Author: Avilo
Quote.Reference: Playing NA ladder
Quote.Text: Playing TvT in NA server is like.. they have just discovered fire, when we all have electricity.

Quote.Author: Axeltoss
Quote.Reference: Brood Lord vs Brood Lord engagement in Idra vs RoRo G2 - BWC 2012
Quote.Text: Brood lord vs brood lord, broodling vs broodling, that's what I call a Brood War!

Quote.Author: Axeltoss
Quote.Reference: Casting Catz vs Hwangsin G2 - WCS NA Qualifiers
Quote.Text: Don't high-five yourself until the game is over.

Quote.Author: Axeltoss
Quote.Reference: StarCraft 2 is real time strategy, not wait a minute and then strategy.
Quote.Text: StarCraft 2 is real time strategy, not wait a minute and then strategy.

Quote.Author: Axeltoss
Quote.Reference: Double Ax banter
Quote.Text: Axeltoss: "You know what's better than one Fleet Beacon?"\nAxslav: "Two?"\nAxeltoss: "I don't think so, actually."

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Coaching on stream
Quote.Text: If your opponent is doing a lot of tricky stuff and doing a lot of damage you can often win by simply focusing on your macro. Most of the time when they are doing that stuff to you they are messing up their own macro back home.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Violet wins #MSIBattlegrounds over Axslav, May 2012
Quote.Text: I want to thank Violet for crushing me in every single tournament we played.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Casting Scarlett vs Bomber G1 - MLG Dallas 2012
Quote.Text: Zerglings are like paper to Scarlett, she can rip'em up and spread'em out, and print out some more.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: The finer points of micro for beginners as explained by Axslav on Rules of Engagement EP02
Quote.Text: When in doubt, don't micro, just attack move.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Casting IdrA vs RorO G2 (~14:50) - BWC Global Finals (17-Nov-2012)
Quote.Text: I've seen Idra smiling on 2 occasions: one is when he's cuddling with his cat and the other is when he beats a top korean player. 2 times in life you'll see this guy smile.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: On PF rush and other crazy builds - Rules of Engagement EP27 P3 (~4:30)
Quote.Text: It's great to do something crazy every once in a while just to refresh your mind. Remember the joy of doing craziness.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Casting Innovation vs TY G4 (HotS beta) - MLG Winter Season Showdowns (~13:55)
Quote.Text: The Hellbat drop is really common right now in Heart of the Swarm, but what's impressive is that it's not common for someone to defend it.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG pro 2v2s
Quote.Text: An Oracle can't shoot an Oracle! It can't counter itself, that's how strong that unit is!

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: Casting Sound vs Golden - MLG Spring Championship 2013 Day 1
Quote.Text: Terran openings fall into 3 categories: reaper expand, command center first, or something weird.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: During MLG's WCS Finals Preview
Quote.Text: As soon as your opponent makes a mistake, you're gonna be ahead, as soon he makes a second mistake, you're gonna win. That's the way Dear plays.

Quote.Author: Axslav
Quote.Reference: RedBull BattleGrounds NY
Quote.Text: There's a certain point in StarCraft when it's just a matter of numbers.

Quote.Author: BabyKnight
Quote.Reference: BabyKnight on laddering as reported by Axeltoss
Quote.Text: Play ladder not to win, but to learn.

Quote.Author: BabyKnight
Quote.Reference: BabyK spreads some positivity on twitter
Quote.Text: As easy as it is to get annoyed over possible imbalances and whatnot, I gotta say: StarCraft is a beautiful game.

Quote.Author: BabyKnight
Quote.Reference: A tip for Zerg players from BabyK - on twitter
Quote.Text: Here's a tip for all you Zerg players out there: you can run away when Void Rays use Prismatic Alignment.

Quote.Author: BabyKnight
Quote.Reference: On balance whining - GosuGamers interview
Quote.Text: There are lots of other good Protosses in Europe, but most of them can't help but whine about balance all the time. I think that hurts their ability to reach their full potential.

Quote.Author: BabyKnight
Quote.Reference: Guilty pleasure - on twitter
Quote.Text: There's no bigger guilty pleasure satisfaction than being AFK the first minute, and then Cannon Rush a 15hatch in PvZ and win anyway.

Quote.Author: BabyKnight
Quote.Reference: Hanging out on Apollo's stream during Proleague
Quote.Text: Desrow: "What do you do on Deadalus."\nBabyKnight: "I lose."

Quote.Author: Bling
Quote.Reference: On losing to Thorzain at MLG Columbus 2012, TL interview
Quote.Text: He slowly killed me. The spoon Terran strikes again.

Quote.Author: Bling
Quote.Reference: MLG Columbus 2012, TL interview
Quote.Text: I believe I am the unofficial king of Britain.

Quote.Author: Bling
Quote.Reference: Lone Star Clash, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Some guy asked for a hug yesterday. I was feeling down and it was very nice to receive a hug.

Quote.Author: Bling
Quote.Reference: Bling meets WhiteRa on ladder while streaming
Quote.Text: Doesn't matter if you scout WhiteRa, you never know what he's gonna do. I'm gonna get some extra minerals.

Quote.Author: Bomber
Quote.Reference: Bomber to MC before the RedBull Battlegrounds Austin Finals
Quote.Text: Are you ready for bombing?

Quote.Author: Bomber
Quote.Reference: Bomber wins the WCS S2 Global Finals
Quote.Text: Goodbye Bomber's law. I'll miss you.

Quote.Author: Bomber
Quote.Reference: Interviewed on Lo3 E171
Quote.Text: I just wanna have one last word: fuck Slasher.

Quote.Author: Bomber
Quote.Reference: Interviewed at RedBull BattleGrounds NY
Quote.Text: I think with age comes slower micro.

Quote.Author: Bomber
Quote.Reference: Bomber plays PvP on NA ladder
Quote.Text: Oracle vs Oracle... imba vs imba.

Quote.Author: Bunny
Quote.Reference: Close encounters of the Grack kind on NA ladder - on twitter
Quote.Text: Played on NA today and received rage from IdrA for the first time. I feel a strange sense of accomplishment.

Quote.Author: Cassandra
Quote.Reference: Stephano (Z) neurals Mana's (P) mothership and takes G2 in the semifinals at ESWC 2012
Quote.Text: Zerg's strongest unit is the Mothership.

Quote.Author: Catz
Quote.Reference: From CatZ views on the WCS situation on reddit
Quote.Text: [Koreans] eat and breathe SC2. Go try to eat and breathe SC2 in the US and see how fast you starve.

Quote.Author: Catz
Quote.Reference: Catz on Catz - From Meta EP5
Quote.Text: Everyone thinks I'm crazy - couple of years down the line I see my strats that I was using two years ago and I'm like... ah, that's old!

Quote.Author: Catz
Quote.Reference: Casting the GameOnGG Invitational
Quote.Text: Is Jabba the Hutt a naked reaver?

Quote.Author: Catz
Quote.Reference: Korean ladder - on twitter
Quote.Text: It doesnt happen often but when I get bm'd on korea its really funny. bi t ch your mother

Quote.Author: Catz
Quote.Reference: On casting - TL interview (12m45s) at MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: Catz: "I am not gonna fake being excited."\nHot_Bid: "Yeah but you can work on being excited..."\nCatZ: "Work on being excited? Are you gonna masturbate me under the desk while I am casting?"

Quote.Author: Clutch
Quote.Reference: Epic outro at NASL S4 Finals (~15:10)
Quote.Text: Good night and good game.

Quote.Author: Clutch
Quote.Reference: Do team houses work? - The Pulse EP2 Part 5 (~19:35)
Quote.Text: Yes, team houses do work, because the marketing value increases when these team members are trained not just as players but as entertainers.

Quote.Author: Clutch
Quote.Reference: Golden age of the Hellbat (HotS beta) in a nutshell - The Pulse EP3
Quote.Text: Every time I build a Hellbat it feels like my birthday.

Quote.Author: DavidKim
Quote.Reference: On being the target of balance hate - MyStarCraft interview
Quote.Text: I try really hard to not take it too personally because I think with every feedback, no matter how aggressive or how bad it sounds, there is an underlying factor that actually matters and that we have to look into.

Quote.Author: DavidKim
Quote.Reference: David Kim special guest on CTL#67
Quote.Text: Suppy: "When are you going to nerf the Artosis Curse?"\nDavidKim: "I don't think I can, it's too strong!"

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Classic Day9 Daily #100 (~1:05)
Quote.Text: There is nothing more cool than being proud of the things you love.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 Daily #405 P2 minute 8:15, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Commentary at a high level is based largely on lying.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 Daily #396, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: I have no girlfriend, but I have a good TvP.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Funday Monday Spine Crawler Push - Day9 Daily #410 P3 (~13:15)
Quote.Text: Always remember the mantra of Protoss StarCraft 2 players: when behind, dark shrine.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On hatch first in ZvP, Day9 Daily #410 P1
Quote.Text: As much as protosses are leery of early expanding, no protosses are leery of building a whole bunch of cannons and getting a free win. Just ask Huk.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Valentine's Day build order, Day9 Daily #418 P1
Quote.Text: 8 movie, 10 dinner, 12 you take her back to her place and if she's not giving you a lot of signals you can always get back in the game with some harassment.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Redbull Lan, Funday Monday w/the pros, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Starcraft 2 was designed to have a best race. You play the worst one.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Mass roaches in PvZ, Day9 Daily #410 P1
Quote.Text: The best counter to roaches is... try to run.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Pre-show, Daily #441
Quote.Text: The secret of how to become a well known shoutcaster? You work every single day for a stupid amount of time.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Daily #441
Quote.Text: The only mortal sin in SC2: being a little bit too happy when you win.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 Daily #451
Quote.Text: A Zealot walks into a bar and says 'My wife for hire!', the bartender replies 'Does she charge-a-lot?'

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9's PvT, Daily #459 P1
Quote.Text: I don't mind a banshee, that's fine. 2 banshees? I HATE you. I actually wish bad things upon you.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 finds out about the official Diablo III release date, March 2012
Quote.Text: Just found out that my career ends on 5.15. And I can preorder it.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting Collegiate Star League (CSL)
Quote.Text: When behind dark shr... wait a minute he's not behind, why is he going dark shrine?

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On eSports economics, Lo3 E117 (min 60)
Quote.Text: In the new economy, not just eSports, no one gives you a job. You have to make your own job. You have to create a profession and then learn to navigate in that profession.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: A wild boner (amanda) appears, casting Oz vs Violet at MLG Summer Arena 2012
Quote.Text: Somebody call Amanda, because this build is awesome.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Text: You gotta be careful 'cause the marines are an effective counter to anything Protoss builds at any point in the game.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Text: As most people who go reapers often find out, when you have a lot of money - fuck it, expand. Sounds like a familiar build order to you?

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Cologne
Quote.Text: There's no better feeling than being manner-muled and end up winning.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Daily #473 P3
Quote.Text: The direct counter to a unit is the marine. The direct counter to a building is a stimmed marine.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Illusion is left with 3 SCVs - Trial of the Xel'Naga (RBLan)
Quote.Text: All you need as a Terran is a Mule and a chair.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Text: The Colossus is the only lover that can spank at range 9. And no, we're not using the metric system folks.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 Blog #2: Getting a Job in eSports
Quote.Text: I have to be honest with you. The chances of your getting a job in eSports are like the odds of you beating Bomber on the ladder.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: StarCraft in a nutshell - Daily #507 P2
Quote.Text: All you have to do is click the right amount of buttons.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting Sheth vs Tod - Lone Star Clash 2, Day 1
Quote.Text: Broodlords are like bacon: way too many is almost enough.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Heavy hellion harass in aLive vs Golden - Iron Squid 2 Group A
Quote.Text: An adventure is the right way to describe the life of a hellion.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting NesTea vs viOLet G2 - Iron Squid 2 Group H
Quote.Text: If all these players were stranded on a desert island they could build a shelter from all their trophies and cheques.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On ladder anxiety, Day9 Daily #533 P1 (~37:00)
Quote.Text: Just have some damn fun! That's why we play games right?

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On WoL hydras - Day9 Daily #535 P2 (~7:15)
Quote.Text: Hydralisks are emergency slow. Like, 10 years old Sean if you broke his leg and then attached coal to his ankles and just made him run a mile, that would still beat a hydralisk.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting MC vs Violet - Iron Squid 2 Ro16
Quote.Text: Note: this quote is a variation to the classic "When behind, Dark Shrine", and appeared for the 1st time in a Daily right after the HotS beta patch that reduced cost of the Dark Shrine to 150/150. Anytime, Dark Shrine.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Funday Monday HotS Units ONLY - Daily #541 P2 (~0:47)
Quote.Text: What happens when a Terran decides to not ever expand ever? Well sometimes he wins a GSL.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 casts in frenglish - IronSquid 2 Finals, SarenS vs ToD HotS showmatch (~8:14:30)
Quote.Text: Sacrebleu, c'est un prism de warping!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 interviewed (~3:00) at IronSquid 2 Finals (26-Jan-2013)
Quote.Text: If you're pretty good at 20 builds you're a pretty good player, but if you're excellent at 1 build you're an excellent player.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: A secret of casting - Daily #550 P2 (~2:17)
Quote.Text: Here's a secret: every caster in existence is well aware when they fuck up on air, and it HURTS... but you just keep going.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting Palantir vs Zynga G3 - AHGL Season 3 Week 4 (06-Feb-2013)
Quote.Text: The wall-off with the orbital command: that's like instead of using sandbags at the war front we protect our troops with Wallmarts, just lined up side by side.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9's praise to the community during HotS launch party (Irvine)
Quote.Text: What makes the Starcraft community a community, is the community.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Daily #564 P2 - Mine'em Up Funday Monday (~4:00)
Quote.Text: When an oracle comes into your base it's like paying taxes.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Lazy Sean and his gorditas - Daily #568 P1 (~26:24)
Quote.Text: I've honestly wanted to be a mothership core sometimes, just because I'm lazy. Like, go to Taco Bell, get my gorditas and recall back home.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 teaches JP THE build
Quote.Text: Minerals are not cannons... yet, but they can be. So build cannons man!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting at the RedBull Training Ground Finals
Quote.Text: Lord Voldemort was the first person to cast a psionic storm on Harry Potter's head.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting Huk vs Naniwa - MLG Spring Championship 2013 Day 2
Quote.Text: The only way you get good at Starcraft is if you're self critical.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Talking about his favorite games while growing up during his Last of Us stream
Quote.Text: Starcraft and Starcraft 2 don't really count as games, they are lifestyle choices.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting 2v2v2v2 FFA - RedBull Training Grounds
Quote.Text: Illusion is making the worst mistake in a free for all environment: he's pissing off everyone.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting HuK vs TLO - RedBull TrainingGrounds
Quote.Text: I never know if a Mothership Core is harrasing or is an idiot, because my Mothership Core is an idiot.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: SOTG EP100
Quote.Text: Like any nerd I get out of bed wearing almost nothing and sit down at my computer, because you don't get dressed for like 3 or 4 hours - first you gotta sit down like mostly naked at your computer and check Liquipedia.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Nuke Funday Monday - Daily #619
Quote.Text: Ravens used to detect Ghosts, how do I stop it? Listen! If you nuke the Raven, then who's countering who?!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: From Daily #622 Megamonobattle Funday Monday
Quote.Text: If there's one unit you don't wanna 1A into something, it's gotta be the Raven.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Daily #627 - Spellcasters Funday Monday P1
Quote.Text: The counter to templar is buildings: CANNON-PUSHING!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Funday Monday Sky Terran HOTS - Daily #607
Quote.Text: Few things are as terrifying as, eventually, Mutalisks. They always get there... eventually.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: GLHF timing - Day9 Daily #632
Quote.Text: If your opponents ever say GLHF after the first 5 seconds, they're cheesing! 100%! It's a rule! It's the GLHF-timing!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Text: Zealot Archon is the ultimate badass fighting force. It is so cool, it's so tough, it's like having an army of Chuck Norrises that choose to die just to make it seem a little fair.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS Season 3 Finals Ro8
Quote.Text: You thought walking into a sliding door hurt, try a force field.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Casting MMA vs Genius - WCS Season 3 Finals
Quote.Text: We know Genius will do an all-in, MMA knows Genius will do an all-in... but this is Protoss, there's about 400 to choose from.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Maru vs JD - WCS Global Finals Ro4 at BlizzCon
Quote.Text: Maru has the perfect army ... it's basically only Marines.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: RedBull BattleGrounds NY
Quote.Text: Scarlett just played so well that we all forgot how to do our jobs. I didn't know what to say and even the analysts were like: DUDE LOOK AT THESE BANES!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On the MMR-Decay
Quote.Text: I think Silver League right now is #1 Grand Master 2 years ago.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 Daily #661
Quote.Text: Roaches, the corsage of Zerg play. You build them, but at the end of every game you say: What the hell are they even for? They are so expensive.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Daily #661 Funday Monday
Quote.Text: Blinking on top of tanks has revealed itself a couple of times over the years as always being tempting and never being worth it.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On Snute-Slivko game during Nation Wars
Quote.Text: That game was like an OK girlfriend: I was OK with it at the time, but I never wanna see it again.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 during the Crawler Offensive Funday Monday #678 - Part 1
Quote.Text: You scout your main base: That's like checking underneath your bed after you wake up to make sure, that the monster hasn't even begun plans to be under your bed later that night.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Day9 casting a ZvZ in the AHGL Season 4 match between Microsoft A+ & Cerner
Quote.Text: The Baneling nest is almost done, but almost is certainly not soon enough in Starcraft 2.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: RedBull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: Scarlett is the only player with more Creep Tumors than workers on the map.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: RedBull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: It's very hard to micro a planetary fortress.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: RedBull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: Players please give long answers. If I'm like: What's your favorite color? Don't be like: red. Be like: well red has always been one of my favorite colors. I know a variety of objects that are red and let me list them for you and why their redness pleases me.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: DongRaeGu builds 34 mutas at once at MLG
Quote.Text: Great dongs think alike.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: On twitter (talking about game making)
Quote.Text: Few things are as frustrating as making a big change to your game that makes it LESS fun.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: RedBull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: He's kiting harder than Ben Franklin!

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: RedBull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: I once was in France and thought I'd knew cheese... then I watched Ruff's stream and there was a punchline to the joke.

Quote.Author: Day9
Quote.Reference: Redbull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: Ruff is more or less all-in which I would call for him 'the comfort zone'.

Quote.Author: Dayshi
Quote.Reference: SC2 Horror - Twitter
Quote.Text: Stephano: "Suggest a horror movie which will make me shit my pants!"\nDayshi: "PvZ."

Quote.Author: Dear
Quote.Reference: Dear joins MouseSports interview
Quote.Text: Because of my desire to win I keep playing even if it's not fun. Then I start getting better and it starts becoming fun again because I'm getting better. I think RTS isn't the right type of game for people who quit because they get frustrated.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: On patch 1.4.3, Inteview at MLG Winter Arena
Quote.Text: The [ghost] nerf was far too harsh and it'll make playing against Zerg late game ridiculously hard.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: On cheesing Ostojiy at MLG Columbus 2012, TL interview
Quote.Text: I was like, man, this guy knocked out Puma, and Puma is amazing, so I am gonna cheese him.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: After losing to Ziktomini in the SC2WCS UK 2012 finals
Quote.Text: I went through the whole tournament against Zerg playing greedy as hell and it finally bit me in the bum.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: Unlike Widow Mines - while streaming NA ladder
Quote.Text: A Hellbat will never turn on you, it'll be your best friend for life.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: Busting epic quotes while streaming ladder
Quote.Text: You can't whine about all-ins when all-ins are the shit right now. It's a risky strategy and it's paying dividends.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: From an EG blogpost
Quote.Text: I don't play this game because it's easy, I play it because it's the best and hardest.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: Competitive spirit - SSC
Quote.Text: Anyone who plays games as much as we do doesn't want to lose.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: Mis-rallied SCV reaches the enemy base and turns around - casting KangHo vs Reality in the FragBite Masters
Quote.Text: That SCV was like a Hobbit on the way to Mordor... right as it saw the gates it said: "SCREW THAT, that's pretty fucking scary" ... and went back home.

Quote.Author: Demuslim
Quote.Reference: Casting HSC IX
Quote.Text: I stopped manner muling against Protoss because I lose to DTs.

Quote.Author: desRow
Quote.Reference: desRow on the GOM house, TL Interview at MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: The GOM house, I like to call it the jungle. There's no really rules, it's more like a LAN party 24/7. It's like the EG house.

Quote.Author: desRow
Quote.Reference: desRow on balance, TL Interview at MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: Terran and Protoss will unite to kidnap David Kim.

Quote.Author: Destiny
Quote.Reference: Baneling analogy, random coaching session, Jan 2011
Quote.Text: Banelings are a lot like rape, OK? Your lings are the hand that reaches around and pulls the waist and the banelings are you, inserting yourself into his body.

Quote.Author: Destiny
Quote.Reference: Laddering from the Startale House, Dec 2011
Quote.Text: I am very open to homosexuality, so I accept your build for what it is.

Quote.Author: Destiny
Quote.Reference: In answer to threats on ladder
Quote.Text: The only thing that would scare me is your mom showing up at the event and telling me she's late.

Quote.Author: Destiny
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Every time I feel like ZvP is too hard or too difficult, I just have to watch TvP and I instantly feel better about myself.

Quote.Author: Destiny
Quote.Reference: Throwback quote form casting LSC 2012
Quote.Text: It does not matter, he's Protoss they only need 3 bases to win, they just take the 4th to BM.

Quote.Author: DIMAGA
Quote.Reference: No one does..., IEM Kiev
Quote.Text: I don't like it when mules go into gold.

Quote.Author: DIMAGA
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: I have so many drones, I hope he will not hurt me.

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: Smack-talk at MLG 2011
Quote.Text: You did improve Naniwa, but you are still no match for me.

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: DRG's only thought in the boot before a game, MLG Columbus 2012
Quote.Text: Time to just kill another person.

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: When asked if he was best in the world, MLG Columbus 2012
Quote.Text: You guys are correct. No one can stop me. Every player is a piece of cake.

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: MLG Columbus 2012, TL interview
Quote.Text: 2nd place? Never. American fans only remember 1st place.

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: DongRaeGu wins MLG Spring Arena #1
Quote.Text: Zerg is the greatest race. For the swarm!

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: DongRaeGu wins MLG Anaheim 2012
Quote.Text: djWHEAT: 'How does it feel to win in front of a sea of fans?'\nDongRaeGu: 'Good shit!'

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: On the use of hydras in G4 against Naniwa, Interview, GSL S3 CodeS RO8 2012
Quote.Text: I was so ahead that I thought I could make any unit and still win so I chose hydras. (...) From now on, unless it's a special situation, I will never use hydras.

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: When asked about his career goal - OSL Interview Reel
Quote.Text: I want to surpass Flash. Then maybe I will have some female fans, right?

Quote.Author: DongRaeGu
Quote.Reference: On facing Naniwa in Ro8 GSL S3 2012, Interview
Quote.Text: I can do whatever I want and still win [against Naniwa]. That's all I have to say.

Quote.Author: Flash
Quote.Reference: Flash about his first SC2 season - Dignitas Interview
Quote.Text: It was my first season in SC2 and I am satisfied, but there are no limits to human greed.

Quote.Author: Flash
Quote.Reference: The word of God - SPL interview
Quote.Text: I love competing and proving that I'm the best out of everyone. That's why I'm always practicing to become the best. It's just another beauty of playing Starcraft 2 professionally.

Quote.Author: Flash
Quote.Reference: Interviewed on Lo3 EP 164
Quote.Text: There is actually not that big of a difference between how I used to practice back then and how I practice now. I keep playing Starcraft because I just don't like to lose.

Quote.Author: Goody
Quote.Reference: Owning nerds at Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: [SCVs] They build faster when you queue them up.

Quote.Author: Goody
Quote.Reference: Why mech is easier macro than bio, Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Only one click, 6 supply.

Quote.Author: Goody
Quote.Reference: From the event floor at Cebit, as reported by AiTarra
Quote.Text: Lower APM equals more skill per action.

Quote.Author: Goody
Quote.Reference: Good logic on ladder with Goody
Quote.Text: uTherma: "If I cheese you camp on one base with tanks. You are the most boring player of all time."\nGoody: "I'm boring because I don't die to your cheese? Good logic."

Quote.Author: Goody
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: My new year's resolution: Be less supply blocked!

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: MLG Winter Arena #1, 2012
Quote.Text: I left all my trophies at home. I'm here to play.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: After beating Losira, MLG Winter Arena 2012
Quote.Text: Everyone in this room is beatable. They're flesh and blood, just like me.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG Spring Arena #1
Quote.Text: With the warp prism warp-in you have 3 seconds to go back with the receipt. No satisfaction, you get your money back.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG Spring Arena #1
Quote.Text: If your name was one base and you had one wish for Christmas it would be that your opponent did not scout.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Classic Grubby
Quote.Text: Remember why you play this game in the first place. It is the love for the game that needs to be #1 in your mind again. Not to please yourself in performance, not to please others, not to get 'results', just to have fun and do your best. It's a game.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: As seen on Real Talk EP3
Quote.Text: If people are annoyed by my style it means I'm doing something good.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Casting biGs (Z) vs NightEnD (P), SC2WCS European Combined
Quote.Text: I'm always scared when I play against Zerg, but it doesn't mean you're necessarily behind just because you're scared of something.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Casting SC2WCS Nordic, Jul 2012
Quote.Text: I hate nothing more than losing to something I know is coming.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Post-game interview with Flash - OSL S1 2012
Quote.Text: They use a different interviewer for every question because they faint when he [Flash] talks.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Grubby on ZvZ, casting SC2 WCS European Combined 2012
Quote.Text: I always say, twice the larva thrice the fun.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Grubby comments on going 0-1 before taking the series a couple of times at SC2WCS EU 2012
Quote.Text: It's almost like I need to get a kick in the balls before I get angry.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Cadred interview at DHVLC 2012
Quote.Text: My greatest skill is enjoyment of the game.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Grubby reveals the secret counter to infestors (on stream)
Quote.Text: The counter to infestors is a big fat nerf.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Grubby as Rain proceeds to win WCSAsia 2012
Quote.Text: When it RAINs, it pours.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Happy new year in the words of Grubby - V-Log #19 (~2:30)
Quote.Text: Happy 2013 where your dreams are coming true, where your lings may have run-bys, your medivacs may go undetected and where your archons may have a really good time on the other side.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: On picking strategies/builds under pressure, as reported by Khaldor during GSL S1 2013 Up and Downs Group C (08-Jan-2013)
Quote.Text: I'd rather play a strategy that is worse but that I feel confident in than play the better strategy not really feeling it and not being 100% behind it.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Cracking jokes while streaming HotS ladder
Quote.Text: Hallucinated colossi cannot crash force fields, they only crash parties.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: On the growth of eSports - blogpost
Quote.Text: eSports has its ups and downs, and unfortunately even some drama. We take one step backwards with every drama (...) but we take two steps forward every time we witness the passion that exists for all of eSports' games

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: On the attack sound of tempests - fun times on HotS ladder with Grubby
Quote.Text: The sound of tempests is like frying bacon... and it's beautiful.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Cannon-rushing a Zerg (Targa) on ladder
Quote.Text: When I cannon-rush, I feel like a man.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: On coaching... and Batman - streaming ladder
Quote.Text: You don't say 'your micro sucks' to anyone, that's rude. You only say it to someone that can take it, like Batman.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Cannon rushing on ladder while streaming
Quote.Text: Roses are red, violets are blue, if you hatch first, I'll cannon rush you.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Grubby being Grubby on stream and twitter
Quote.Text: Sweet GGs are made of cheese. Who are you to disagree?

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Force are bad... if you are Grubby - on stream
Quote.Text: I think force fields are bad, because he is safer from me!

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: StarCraft philosophy - on twitter
Quote.Text: If a Mule lands in the forest, but no one is watching/listening, did it ever live?

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: To the stream chat after losing a PvT while streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Please don't blame the race for my mistakes.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: I don't always chrono all my gateways, but when I do I'm supply blocked.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Grubby defeats MVP to advance to the WCS EU S2 Ro8
Quote.Text: I've never felt the way I did just now. It never gets old, it stays hard, there's always new challenges.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Interview at WCS EU S2 Finals
Quote.Text: To describe my playstyle... I once heard someone say: Grubby is just like a box of chocolate, you never know what you're gonna get.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Streaming and singing with Grubby
Quote.Text: Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down, always gonna Nexus first and defend it.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Scout, not hope - Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Now I have to hope that he has no more bases. No - I have to scout, not to hope!

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: SC2 commentary meets discovery channel
Quote.Text: I studied the Mutalisk in her natural habitat.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Casting NorthCon, as Jjakji proxy-reapers Scarlett
Quote.Text: I don't use the word cheese: it's a quick, tactical attack.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Sound advice from Grubby
Quote.Text: You know how to win 3 maps in a row? One map at a time.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Casting ATC Playoffs Liquid vs Western Wolves
Quote.Text: Khaldor: "Only a dead Zealot is a good Zealot."\nGrubby: "I don't think that's how the saying goes, I think it was the Zealot doesn't fall far from the Nexus."

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Streaming Ladder
Quote.Text: Alterzim in PvP is a real Phoenix map, but you don't wanna die before you start producing Phoenix. It's very difficult to make a comeback when you GGed and left the game, no matter how many Phoenix you have.

Quote.Author: Grubby
Quote.Reference: Asus ROG Winter 2014
Quote.Text: If you make more than 20 swarmhost in a game, you are killing eSports.

Quote.Author: Harstem
Quote.Reference: Triple mind games - PvP analysis laddering on stream
Quote.Text: Maybe it's a 4-gate or maybe he just macroed poorly... or maybe it's triple mind games.

Quote.Author: Harstem
Quote.Reference: Casting ESGN Fight Night arcade edition
Quote.Text: When you are scratching your elbows, you know you're in a good spot.

Quote.Author: Harstem
Quote.Reference: Harstem goes down 0-1 vs FireCake and uses an Immortal all-in to tie-up the series - HSC IX
Quote.Text: When behind, immortal all in.

Quote.Author: HasuObs
Quote.Reference: Casting WhiteRa vs Bly, SC2 WCS Ukraine
Quote.Text: He's getting a warp prism, a small indicator of saying: I am going to kill you.

Quote.Author: HasuObs
Quote.Reference: On stream, Hasu speculates on Goody's possible playstyle in HotS
Quote.Text: I think mech will be viable in HotS so we will see good old Goody queuing up 5 tanks while taking the 3rd, morphing it into planetary and queuing up another 5 tanks and then slowly killing you.

Quote.Author: HasuObs
Quote.Reference: Beautiful death sounds - casting Home Story Cup VII Day 3
Quote.Text: The sound of the Swarm Host dying is so beautiful.

Quote.Author: HerO
Quote.Reference: The end of an hour long NASL game, passive Dimaga at his best
Quote.Text: Hero: 'WHY NOT COME'\nDIMAGA: 'I want win'\nHero: 'OK GG'

Quote.Author: HerO
Quote.Reference: Hero on Sheth, Liquid Rising
Quote.Text: Sheth's stomach is very big, so it's really cute.

Quote.Author: HerO
Quote.Reference: The dark knight rises: HerO wins NASL S4
Quote.Text: I will be the HerO that you deserve.

Quote.Author: Huk
Quote.Reference: MLG Columbus 2012, TL interview
Quote.Text: Sometimes when you are really tired you get into the zone, and it just works.

Quote.Author: Huk
Quote.Reference: Interview at MLG Columbus, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Taking ukranian vodka is a big mistake.

Quote.Author: Huk
Quote.Reference: Hellbat tip from Huk - streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Hellbats: it does not matter what you drop them on, just drop them on shit!

Quote.Author: Huk
Quote.Reference: Life of a pro-gamer - RedBull eSports interview
Quote.Text: Once you've won a few top tier tournaments, everything else feels like a huge disappointment and breaks your heart.

Quote.Author: Huk
Quote.Reference: On twitter after winning LANHammer SC2 Tournament
Quote.Text: When pro players from other games win a tournament, they get pumped and excited. When a SC2 pro player wins, they're simply exhausted. Real testament to just how hard SC2 can be.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: SOPA Blackout, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: I usually don't take stances on things

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Stimmed marines vs drones, Taeja TvZ, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Remember guys, don't do drugs as it does make you vulnerable to drone attacks.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Casting RedBull Battlegrounds (Austin)
Quote.Text: Stephano is very good at being French.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Casting SeleCT vs VortiX, TSL4 Qualifiers
Quote.Text: If you have to do the same build every single time you might as well play chess.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: On content diversification - Real Talk EP10
Quote.Text: I'm definitely never gonna quit Starcraft. When I'm 50 if you meet me on the street you can hold it to me.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: One of the many Husky videos on youtube
Quote.Text: I still love the idea of the medivac where it's like 'oh my god heal me!' and it's like 'no, we have to drop you on the ground and THEN we'll heal you'. Because that makes sense.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Casting WhiteRa vs AbomB (~8:40)
Quote.Text: Just like saving the whales man, save the Nexus is quite important.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: From Bronze League Heros EP 17 (~6:55)
Quote.Text: My favorite children's book was about a failed zergling bust.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Casting SHOUTcraft America 2013 - Day1
Quote.Text: Every valid strategy that makes your opponent lose is just that: a valid strategy.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Casting Minigun vs Maker - SHOUTcraft America 2013 Day1
Quote.Text: Anytime you give Terran a bunch of new toys, they'll try it in a 1-1-1 against Protoss.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Bronze League Heroes EP 31
Quote.Text: It doesn't matter how good or bad at StarCraft you are, you should always play at least one game a day, 'cause one game a day keeps the... BM away.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Casting 1v1v1v1 FFA - WCS America S2 Finals
Quote.Text: There's only one build I've learned that you don't need a mouse or keyboard: it's the 4-gate.

Quote.Author: Husky
Quote.Reference: Classic Husky
Quote.Text: Life isn't just about winning guys, it's about trying to consistently get 2nd place if your name is Jaedong.

Quote.Author: Iaguz
Quote.Reference: ESL interview at IEM Shanghai
Quote.Text: I always have the mentality that you win or you lose, but I'll just be playing Starcraft tomorrow anyway, I'll just keep doing this.

Quote.Author: Iaguz
Quote.Reference: After Innovation all-killed EG in the Acer Team Story Cup
Quote.Text: Woe to the poor bastard who sits at the wrong end of Innovation's marines.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Classic Idra rage vs Mana, Aug 2011
Quote.Text: This is a fucking joke. Fuck you.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Playing TT1 on his stream
Quote.Text: He's french-canadian so he's gonna fast-expand into a stupid zealot timing into something else gay.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: On SC2 regulating body, on twitter
Quote.Text: A regulating body is a great idea, but good luck finding a competent unbiased group of people willing to do it. In my opinion just give Artosis control of everything.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Huk (P) plays Idra (Z) on ladder, Feb 2012
Quote.Text: Huk: 'On a scale of 1 to Idra how mad are you right now?'\nIdra: 'No, I have accepted the idiocy that is your race. I am just amazed.'

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Casting at IEM Hanover, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: 6 pool doesn't work anymore, because drones are better than lings.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra returns the infamous smiley (and then some) as he crushes Cruncher, NASL, Apr 2012

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Streaming rivalry, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: Thank god Stephano is not streaming anymore, little fucker shit on my viewers.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: The Grack drops the bomb on ITG E40
Quote.Text: I don't like Starcraft 2. I play because it's something I am good at, it's something I have been involved in for a lot of time and I like the competition. But I think the game is shit. I don't love it at all.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra pLays Spades in the open bracket, TL Interview, MLG Anheim 2012
Quote.Text: It turns out the game is a lot harder when you can't see the whole map.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: In-game chat to Creator after defeating MKP, EG vs Prime at IPL-TAC
Quote.Text: Me chobo but MKP more chobo.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: After accidentally killing his 3rd hatch with queens, Idra vs Illusion, SC2WCS NA Finals at MLG Raleigh
Quote.Text: In my experience killing your own buildings often helps win games.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Classic Idra laddering on stream, sometime in 2011
Quote.Text: Terran micro is silly.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra on solo casting - EG vs Empire, EG Masters Cup W8D6
Quote.Text: Turns out if you talk fast and say starcraft words people buy it.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: On mothership core - streaming ladder
Quote.Text: He does have the mothership core recall, so he can be stupid for free at least once.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder - as reported by Khaldor
Quote.Text: I like this kid, he loses when he's supposed to. That's a good quality in a person.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra on LoL - on stream chat
Quote.Text: Leagues isn't nearly as stress inducing [as StarCraft], all the pretty colors are calming.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Terran good unit - on twitter
Quote.Text: I want some of whatever they were on when they made Terran.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: A tip from Idra - streaming ladder (07-Apr-2013)
Quote.Text: The key for winning against Protoss is to have your opponent suck.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Kittens and StarCraft - streaming ladder
Quote.Text: The secret to enjoying Starcraft is playing with a kitten on your lap.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Mind games... or not - on twitter
Quote.Text: I can never tell if players who do the same cheesy thing every game in a series are smart and mindgaming or just shit.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Current Terran meta - META EP7 (~1:00:30)
Quote.Text: The current Terran Meta is 3 CCs 2 Ebays, all off of 6 hellions and then you build like 4 baracks at once. It's kind of ok that they're dying to stuff right now.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra learns Terran on stream
Quote.Text: I know I said I was going to learn Terran, but I'm just going to Hellbat drop and beat everybody.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Casting Gowser vs Lucifron G3 - Asus ROG Ro16
Quote.Text: Khaldor: "Why would he leave with a 20k bank, even you wouldn't leave in such a position."\nIdra: "Don't challenge me, you'd be surprised."

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Scariest thing about bio widow mine is how badly most terrans still play it and how strong it is anyway.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: You cannot counter Void Rays with Corruptors, unless he has zero Void Rays.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra on balance
Quote.Text: Just switch to Protoss, you don't need to practice 4 hours a day to be good.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra from the IEM desk as Taeja wins DH Winter and takes 1st place for the 5th time in 2013
Quote.Text: Taeja, he is somewhat talented.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Sometimes after complaining about Protoss I catch myself and think there must be something to it that I'm not recognizing. Then I watch a Protoss player play and realize the thing that I'm missing it's actually even dumber than I realize.

Quote.Author: Idra
Quote.Reference: Idra on Maps in SC2 - onGamers interview
Quote.Text: Most StarCraft maps are unspectacular. Broodwar had the longevity, depth, and quality it did largely because of the maps and map makers, and towards the end a lot of that was through strange and unusual maps with features people didn't even think were possible. StarCraft 2 needs a lot more of that.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: On queen chasing overlord, NASL 2011
Quote.Text: It's like a cop chasing a guy, but the cop is walking and so is the guy.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting at HomeStory Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Scariest thing I've done in my life: buying a kebab in Germany.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: On Starcast #89
Quote.Text: It takes a village to raise an Idra.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: MLG Winter Arena PPV Wars, On SOTG EP #63
Quote.Text: It's tough to interview MLG about things they fuck-up on, because they agree on everything.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting EGMCSL, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: Every time I hear a player doesn't stream as much I think: 'do they not like money?'

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: GSL Code S Season 2 Finals, on ITG E43
Quote.Text: 3 Protoss and a Terran walk into a bar. Only the Terran fucking leaves.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting DIMAGA vs Brat_OK (2-0), DreamHack Summer 2012
Quote.Text: Commentating DIMAGA ZvT right now is like commentating national geographic footage of hyenas eating a dead carcass.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: After MaNa vs Stephano (2-0), DreamHack Summer 2012
Quote.Text: I would be speechless, but I'm getting paid not to be.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: We will never hear the rest of the story, casting Monchi vs Golden at HSC5 Day2, July 2012
Quote.Text: I happen to know that in the gay community... well... this is getting dangerous.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Idra disconnects while casting Stephano vs Hero, NASL S3 Grand Finals
Quote.Text: Greg you're disconnecting, are you rage-quitting from this too?

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: German porn and Starcraft, ASUSROG Summer 2012 Highlights
Quote.Text: I used to play random, but for you I'll play very specifikly.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: EGIdra tries to brute force his way up a ramp vs colGoswser - EGMCSL S8
Quote.Text: He keeps trying to force himself up the ramp against all RTS logic. Ramps are the devil.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: On Life winning GSL S4 2012 - ITG E57
Quote.Text: Young people do really well at this game because they don't give a shit.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Talking about late game ZvP casting JYP vs Suppy - Stormville Show Match
Quote.Text: 5 bases is Disney World, 4 bases is Disney Land, 3 bases... Six Flags, it sucks.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Halo and StarCraft in the eSports scene porn metaphor, according to iNcontroL - Drunk SOTG 2012
Quote.Text: StarCraft 2 is the climax, Halo is the ball ticklers.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: On video games violence - ITG E59
Quote.Text: At the beginning of the last century we had a couple of world wars, and nobody played video games. (...) Hitler did not play video games.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: When asked about Huk's elimination from GSL Code S - ITG E60
Quote.Text: Anybody who qualifies for Code S is to be respected. Anybody who loses in Code S is to be understood.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: HotS air-toss impersonation vs Zerg (must watch) E62 (~1:06:45)
Quote.Text: En Taro ah-fuck-it, let's move out!

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting Bomber vs Goswser G3 - MLG Winter Championship 2013 ro32 (Dallas)
Quote.Text: He's got 3 nukes but no ghosts! Oh my god he's North Korea!

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: You hit it hard - SOTG EP90 (~1:27:50)
Quote.Text: Not using Hellbats right now, because you think they are gonna get nerfed, is like being in a relationship with a drop-dead gorgeous woman but being like: You know what? I'm not gonna have too much sex with her, because eventually she'll be an older woman that doesn't look as good.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Angry Mutas - while streaming some ladder
Quote.Text: He's not going magic mutas, he's going angry mutas. That's the muta style where you just don't give a fuck and you just kinda make mutas.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Scan good unit - On ITG EP69
Quote.Text: If a Terran player is ever complaining about scouting, I am gonna blow my head off.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting EG SC2L
Quote.Text: Reapers are the little brothers of Starcraft - they are just made to be annoying.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting Acer vs Team Liquid SC2L Playoffs
Quote.Text: To become Innovation, all you have to do is do his builds, increase your APM by about 400, have the calm, cool and collected nerves of a guy that's been training in Korea his entire life and then you need to eat Kimchi and you too can be the best Starcraft 2 player on the planet.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Whenever you lose to a cannon-rush it's no one's fault but your own.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: iNcontroL coaching Team Liquid during the pizza.gg teamswap
Quote.Text: The perfect counter to Huk is just to make more defenses.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: The unwritten rule of StarCraft
Quote.Text: You can't ever do well at all 3 match-ups. That's some unwritten rule in Starcraft people may or may not know about.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Interviewing Genius after beating DuckDeok - WCS EU S3 Premier League Ro8
Quote.Text: In game 1 you won with Voidrays, then Cannons, then DTs - so I just wanna ask you how does it feel to be Idra's favorite Protoss on the entire planet.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Taeja wins HSC VIII
Quote.Text: He can't clap for shit, but this guy can play StarCraft 2.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Naniwa punishes Life's Hatch-first with a Cannon-Rush in the Winners Round 1 of DH Winter 2013
Quote.Text: Sometimes Life gives you lemons, and you cannon rush the shit outta him.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting DreamHackWinter 2013
Quote.Text: I AM biased: I love Starcraft, more than any other game.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: IEM Katowice Open Bracket
Quote.Text: Ret: "Don't players play Protoss because everything looks shiny?"\niNcontroL: "Well do you play Zerg because everything looks like a booger?"

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: iNcontroL and Ret casting together - IEM Katowice Open Bracket
Quote.Text: I am Incontrol, he is Ret, we are both @LiquidRet on twitter.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting the Midwest PRO / AM Tournament
Quote.Text: Koreans are the warlords of Starcraft 2.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting JD vs Snute at DH Open
Quote.Text: I made a mistake, I tried to call a Roach battle. Dammit.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting Life vs Innovation - DH Open semi-finals
Quote.Text: Life is battling Innovation. He's battling the Artosis Curse. He's battling gravity since he's not that tall...

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting HSC IX
Quote.Text: Every player has that spirit of a caster

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting a cannon rush from Huk - DH Open Summer
Quote.Text: Artosis doesn't even have a pylon anymore, he has a deck now.

Quote.Author: iNcontroL
Quote.Reference: Casting DH Open Summer
Quote.Text: Bunny's army has become the American healthcare - there are no medivacs anymore and if he wanted them they are very expensive.

Quote.Author: INnoVation
Quote.Reference: TL interview
Quote.Text: At first, I thought that one championship would be enough to call myself a good player, and be called a good player by others. But after winning a championship, I didn't really feel anything, so I think I have to keep winning.

Quote.Author: INnoVation
Quote.Reference: Team Acer Grilled interview (~16:42)
Quote.Text: I can't really name a player who really sticks out and who would be a worthy opponent and rival to me. So in the end it's me who is my own rival, if I can beat myself I will be able to beat anyone else.

Quote.Author: INnoVation
Quote.Reference: WCS KR Representatives interview
Quote.Text: I'm most confident in my TvT and TvP. Although TvZ is difficult, there isn't a Zerg that I fear.

Quote.Author: INnoVation
Quote.Reference: Winner Interview of GSL Ro32 Group H
Quote.Text: After I won game one, I momentarily forgot that Protoss is OP.

Quote.Author: Jaedong
Quote.Reference: Pre-finals interview at DHOpen Valencia
Quote.Text: I am not a ZvZ player, I'm a JvZ player.

Quote.Author: Jaedong
Quote.Reference: The force is strong with this one - Jaedong gets 2nd at WCS Global Finals Blizzcon
Quote.Text: Do you know my Broodwar id? My id was 'Neverdie Jaedong'. It means Never ever die Jaedong!!! Don't forget. The Tyrant will be back soon!

Quote.Author: Jaedong
Quote.Reference: BW and SC2 - EG interview
Quote.Text: After having played both games, I can see that there is no reason to assume that just because one player was very good in Brood War, he'd also be the best in SC2.

Quote.Author: Jjakji
Quote.Reference: TL interview
Quote.Text: While I'm in Europe, other players shouldn't even dream of taking #1 on the ladder.

Quote.Author: Jjakji
Quote.Reference: TeamLiquid double-interview with Stardust & Jjakji after they advanced to the WCS EU Ro8
Quote.Text: Hot_Bid: "You think Foreigners will win a WCS season?"\nJjakji: "No, cause WCS has Jjakji."

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: On filling the gap left behind by Bitterdam - ESFI Interview
Quote.Text: At the end of the day we're all just gamer nerds.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Casting EPS Berlin Open 2012
Quote.Text: There are four races currently in Starcraft: Protoss, Zerg, Terran and Korean Terran.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Casting Naama vs Mana - IEM Katowice Qualifiers
Quote.Text: None of the Finnish players ever play standard, (...) all of them are fueled by the power of vodka.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: PartinG introduces the soul-train in PvT vs Dream in G2 - Ro4 IEM Katowice 2013
Quote.Text: Knock knock, choo-choo, GG!

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: On PvZ in HotS early days - casting sLivko vs PartinG G2, IEM World Championship (05-Mar-2013)
Quote.Text: I have a feeling that Protoss vs Zerg is slowly turning into Protoss vs Corruptors.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Hellbat drops all over the place during ForGG vs Bunny - WCS EU Ro32 Group A
Quote.Text: The night is dark and full of terrans.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Casting Stephano vs BabyKnight - WCS EU Ro8
Quote.Text: If you can calculate exactly how many locusts died in this game... I'll give you a copy of StarCraft.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: SC2 New Year resolution - on twitter
Quote.Text: One of my New Years Resolutions guys: STOP forgetting Spore Crawlers.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Rain scouts every attempt of HerO to proxy a building against him - IEM Cologne R032 Group A
Quote.Text: Rain is the Christopher Columbus of SC2, he finds everything!

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Katowice
Quote.Text: Desperation time, Dark Shrine.

Quote.Author: Kaelaris
Quote.Reference: Casting the WCS America vs WCS Europe 3v3 showmatch
Quote.Text: Protoss do what Protoss do best... Blink and Dark Shrines for Team Europe.

Quote.Author: Khaldor
Quote.Reference: Casting aLive vs First in Code A Ro48, GSL S3 2012
Quote.Text: Forget Girls Gone Wild this is just FnaticaLive going crazy.

Quote.Author: Khaldor
Quote.Reference: Casting Maru vs Effort - GSL Code A S4
Quote.Text: I don't believe in miracles but I believe in Maru.

Quote.Text: BboongBboong is broke! He can't even afford chewing gum!

Quote.Reference: Casting YongHwa vs Squirtle G1 - GSL Code A, Round2, Day2, Match2

Quote.Author: Khaldor
Quote.Reference: Casting RoRo vs Parting G4 - WCS Korea 5th/6th place decider match
Quote.Text: I'm so excited, if I was pregnant I would give birth right now. This game is insane, I think my water just broke.

Quote.Reference: Acer.Innovation all-kills FXOpen in GSTL

Quote.Author: Khaldor
Quote.Reference: Casting Hurricane vs First G2 - WCS Korea S3 Challenger League

Quote.Reference: How Protoss plays PvZ on Daedalus Point

Quote.Author: Khaldor
Quote.Reference: Casting Kane vs. ToD in the ATC qualifier
Quote.Text: I'm not going to kid anybody here, this game is boring as fuck.

Quote.Reference: JYP's Probe annoys the mineral line of Bunny - Acer Team Story Cup, TL vs EG

Quote.Reference: Streaming Korean ladder

Quote.Text: Wine openings don't transition well to hard liquor late game.

Quote.Author: MaddeLisk
Quote.Reference: On twitter
