Quote.Author: MajOr
Quote.Reference: Artosis interview
Quote.Text: TvP never really changes, just make Marauders and try to win.

Quote.Author: MajOr
Quote.Reference: Interview at MLG, 2011
Quote.Text: JP: "What would you like to say to your fans?" \nMajor: "I dont think I have any fans."

Quote.Author: MajOr
Quote.Reference: MajOr from the event floor at MLG Dallas 2012
Quote.Text: Mech isn't a build, it's a way of life.

Quote.Author: MajOr
Quote.Reference: Can't possibly explain this out of context, just follow the link and LOL - SOTG EP75
Quote.Text: You put the tone and then I add the symphony.

Quote.Author: MajOr
Quote.Reference: MajOr joins KeSPA Team 8 - Daily eSports TL translation
Quote.Text: My pro-gamer dreams have come halfway true. The rest is up to me to make come true.

Quote.Author: MaNa
Quote.Reference: Can a foreigner win GSL? - Interviewed on NASL The Pulse Pilot Episode
Quote.Text: The best foreign player playing the most imbalanced race might be able to win the GSL championship.

Quote.Author: MaNa
Quote.Reference: MaNa chatting with Naniwa on twitter
Quote.Text: I like everyone, so everyone likes me back! But when I am alone I hate Zergs.

Quote.Author: MaNa
Quote.Reference: Streaming Ladder
Quote.Text: Which unit gets worse when you upgrade it? None except the Mothership Core.

Quote.Author: MaNa
Quote.Reference: Gamer dad - on twitter
Quote.Text: My dad just called me: 'Hey, you warming up?, don't die to all ins, make a lot of bases, and don't do stupid things. OK, bye'. WOW.

Quote.Author: MarineKing
Quote.Reference: Casting at Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: MKP: "Daybreak, Protoss map."\nMC: "Why???"\nMKP: "All map Protoss map."

Quote.Author: MarineKing
Quote.Reference: Casting at Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: 1 base. Cheese man.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: When asked why so few korean players have showmanship skills, Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Many Korean progamer shy boy.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Casting at Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text:
MKP: 'MC girlfriend very pretty.'
MC: 'Why now say???'
MKP: 'I think now.'
*MC: 'We are in game, motherfather!'

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Casting at Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: OK, I make Goody nickname: supply block Terran.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: After MC-Violet 3-0 (PvZ), IEM Hanover quarterfinals, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Protoss so imba!

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: MC wins IEM Hanover ($35K) - note: out of cockiness before the final
Quote.Text: Thanks IEM for giving me money.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: MLG Winter 2012
Quote.Text: MarineKing is only king of marine, I am king of all units.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Watching Puma vs Polt at IPL4
Quote.Text: TvT is so boring. Imba race playing each other so boring.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Casting NesTea vs Stephano at IPL4, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: DOA: 'A lot of signs for Stephano, where are the signs for NesTea?' \nMC: 'In Korea.'

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: War declaration, TL interview, GSL S3 CodeS RO8 2012
Quote.Text: My prize money so far is 5 times what Naniwa's is so that means it will take 5 Naniwas to take me down.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Interview (~2:20) at ASUSROG Summer 2012
Quote.Text: Maybe some people hate confidence play but it's true - I'm so fucking good, yeah?

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: MC on Zerg scouting, casting Stephano vs BabyKnight - HSCVI Group C, Stage 2
Quote.Text: Over-maphack scouting natural, only 100 minerals. (...) Dev listening? We want pylon flying!

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Pre IEM Hanover ESL interview (~3:18)
Quote.Text: Zerg players not good skill, because the guys in WoL always using infestor, broodlord... no skill units, just imba units so they always champion. You know what? Now GSL 4 times Zerg champion.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: MC on team-houses - Machinima interview
Quote.Text: Living alone makes you lazy but comfortable, but in teamhouse you are a little uncomfortable but you don't get lazy.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: MC interviewed after beating Thorzain 2-1 to advance to the WCS EU ro16
Quote.Text: I'm world of best cheeser.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Interviewed at WCS EU S3 Premier League
Quote.Text: I'm just enjoying now. So champion, runner-up doesn't matter to me because if I focus champion I will make so many stress. Just enjoying, enjoying makes fun games.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Protoss has a good day at WCS S3 Finals
Quote.Text: People will say Protoss is imba, but that's what they say about every race when they are doing well. I just think it's a period where Protoss is strong. Like always, it will pass eventually.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Casting HSC VIII
Quote.Text: If I am Dark Templar real life, I just go girls restroom.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Redbull's Byte Size with MC
Quote.Text: In Baseball and Basketball you must know rules, but Starcraft 2 is just easy watching because no rules. Just losing and winning.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: Hot_Bid interview at SeatStoryCup
Quote.Text: Some people hate protoss because protoss is really really handsome.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: After beating Nerchio 2-1 in the WCS Europe Ro16
Quote.Text: All protoss hate Mutalisks

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: MC casting at HSC IX
Quote.Text: Storm is good but terran have EPM. And EMP fucking joke.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: DH Open Summer
Quote.Text: No build needed, just cannon rush and destroy.

Quote.Author: MC
Quote.Reference: nOn twitter
Quote.Text: When I in the gym I don't know what should I see because german girls body is so hot... making me Excitement.

Quote.Author: MikeMorhaime
Quote.Reference: Blizzard announces global WCS - GameSpot interview
Quote.Text: The time is right to level-up StarCraft II as an eSport.

Quote.Author: MiniGun
Quote.Reference: Being boss in a custom game, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: My sick micro gets all the girls.

Quote.Author: MiniGun
Quote.Reference: Some great advice for Protoss players from MiniGun - casting GameOn invitational
Quote.Text: So here you just want to 1a, and, you know, just make sure you are 1a-ing correctly.

Quote.Author: MMA
Quote.Reference: Smack-talk before the finals vs the SICK-NERD-BALLER, IEM Kiev, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Dimaga who?

Quote.Author: MMA
Quote.Reference: MMA about his love life, CyberSportsNetwork interview
Quote.Text: Three years no girl, only game.

Quote.Author: MMA
Quote.Reference: Interview at WCS EU S2 Finals
Quote.Text: My playstyle is to drive my opponent crazy.

Quote.Author: MMA
Quote.Reference: Acer MMA after beating JD in the WCS S3 Final group stage - on twitter
Quote.Text: Dead zerg = good zerg

Quote.Author: MMA
Quote.Reference: Winners interview after beating Stardust in the DH Winter group stage
Quote.Text: It feels like I'm not playing against the player, but I'm playing against the cold. So I think they did a really good job naming this tournament Dreamhack Winter.

Quote.Author: MMA
Quote.Reference: MMA when asked about his legendary game against Idra at MLG Colombus 2011 during his Reddit AMA
Quote.Text: I thought I destroyed my CC but it seemed like the only thing I destroyed was Idra's mentality.

Quote.Author: mOOnGLaDe
Quote.Reference: mOOnGLaDe explains StarCraft - interview on Australian TV (this is the morning after HOTS launch party so he had very little sleep)
Quote.Text: The game I play is called StarCraft 2 (...). The game itself is pretty much I guess kinda like a real-time stress... err, sorry, real-time chess game.

Quote.Author: Morrow
Quote.Reference: Morrow wins NASL showmatch and mining out challenge vs Idra
Quote.Text: I have never driven a tractor and neither has he. It's all about talent and I think I have more.

Quote.Author: MVP
Quote.Reference: WCS S1 Global Finals - OGN Lounge Interview
Quote.Text: I'm a Korean, but I think for Starcraft I'm a European.

Quote.Author: Naniwa
Quote.Reference: Twitter, Dec 2011
Quote.Text: Forge expand or die trying.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: From the StarNation Nani-Ra trailer
Quote.Text: Unless I win I am not happy overall, as a person.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Comments on his rivalry with NesTea after beating him 2-1, MLG Winter Arena
Quote.Text: Clearly I am not as good as him overall, but he seems to be pretty weak against me.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: On Twitter
Quote.Text: I'm glad I have starcraft, it's so much better than the real world!

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Naniwa cancels his interview on JP McDaniel's Real Talk
Quote.Text: When I'm done with SC2 I make my book of all SC2 secrets. Bound to be a bestseller. Juicy Idra stuff in there.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Real Talk with Naniwa EP09 (~1:10:20)
Quote.Text: Let's face it, when you're part of a team you're basically their bitch.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Words of wisdom when asked if he talked to Flash after beating him - CSN interview at MLG Dallas 2012
Quote.Text: I have enough respect for players not to bug them after the game. You have to respect them if you want them to respect you.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Team Alliance interview
Quote.Text: It doesn't matter to me if I face a Korean or a foreigner. My goal is to be the best I can be, and I think I have the potential to be the best player of all, so that's what I'm aiming for.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Alliance interview
Quote.Text: Foreigners are just scared of Korean players and think they are something special. I've competed against the Koreans for a long time now and I know their playstyle / level. I have no reason to be scared anymore, even if they are very good.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Winner interview after Naniwa vs San 3-1 - IEM Season VIII New York Ro8
Quote.Text: I log on to every community site and just see all this depressing stuff like 'StarCraft is dying' and whatever and then I come here and I hear this kind of loud cheering, it makes me really happy.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: On Meta EP20
Quote.Text: I never go into a match thinking that I'm going to win, I just think about my builds and what I'm supposed to do, and I just do it.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Alliance interview
Quote.Text: When you have a match in front of you, you have to give it your all no matter how tired or sick you are. You can complain afterwards, but you should always, as a pro-gamer, try your best no matter what the conditions are.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Naniwa in the Bitcoin Starcraft Challenge Winners Interview
Quote.Text: I play to win right? But it's still really boring to have to punish a player just because they're so greedy and refuse to play a straight up game.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: Bitcoin Starcraft Challenge Winners Interview
Quote.Text: A win always feels much better if you practiced really hard, because then it feels like you deserve it.

Quote.Author: NaNiwa
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Targa: "Anyone else getting a weird bug with keyboard and mouse suddenly not working anymore when you're playing sc2?"\nNaniwa: "It's called fungal."

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Audio-casting EG-TL vs Team8 - Proleague Season 2012-2013, Round 2, Week 3
Quote.Text: The only girl in my life is the one that keeps telling me I'm supply blocked.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting Clarity Gaming Pro HotS KOTH #4
Quote.Text: It's never cheese if you're a Terran.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Sick line casually dropped on twitter
Quote.Text: Good players make magic happen, bad players make excuses.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting Tails vs Dayshi G2 - Acer Teamstory Cup Week 11, MVP vs Millenium
Quote.Text: Nothing happened in the game so far, so Dayshi is ahead by being Terran.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting Stephano vs Jaedong G2 - DreamHack Summer 2013 Ro16
Quote.Text: The nydus-worm is about to explode in Stephano's main, the Dong is now all over him.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting ATC Millenium vs Acer
Quote.Text: The counter to hellbat drops is to just not have any drones it seems.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting Taeja vs Hyun - Liquid vs Quantic, ATC Week 14
Quote.Text: Hyun without a Roach Warren is like Batman stopped wearing a mask or something. Like he got rid of a critical part of who he is.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Shanghai
Quote.Text: Templar energy is not the most renewable source of energy we've found.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: On balance philosophy - reddit comment
Quote.Text: The more buffs and less nerfs, the more interesting games we will get! Never forget that at HotS release oracles and Medivacs were imba, players got BETTER to accommodate those changes.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: On twitter during Maru vs Dear - WCS S3 Finals
Quote.Text: The only mech Terran needs is a widow mine in a field of probes.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: I officially support the movement to rename all survivors to 'Taejans' as Terrans continue to dwindle.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: On twitch chat during Unfiltered #34
Quote.Text: I played Brood War for years without even knowing there was an eSports scene, because I loved the game.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Nathanias on twitter watching ProLeague - Flash vs eMotion - KT Rolster vs Samsung Galaxy Round 1 Week 2
Quote.Text: Watching Flash is like everyone gathering around a campfire and telling a grand tale of heroism and bravery.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting the WCS America vs WCS Europe 3v3 showmatch
Quote.Text: Taeja's brought a quadruple medivac drop of freedom!

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Nathanias playing TvZ on WayStation
Quote.Text: This Zerg player has literally 5 years... It's like I have to issue a warrant before I can go attack him, that's how long it takes to get over there.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Stephano makes it through the second WCS EU Qualifier
Quote.Text: Wanna save eSports? Make Nani play vs Stephano in challenger, no way on earth they don't practice enough to win the whole Region.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder sometimes in early 2014
Quote.Text: I don't always control my Hellions that well, but when I do Zergs drop like flies.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: On a probe following the only drone outside of Check's cannoned baseCasting during Check vs Top - WCS America Season 2 Ro32 Group D
Quote.Text: Whereever you go... cannons will follow.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: Casting DH Open Summer
Quote.Text: There's too much Dong here.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: TL interview (3m55s) at MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: Not everybody who tries has Apollo say: hey, I think this guy should come and cast the event. There was luck involved, but I don't think I would've been noticed if I hadn't worked for as long as I did.

Quote.Author: Nathanias
Quote.Reference: TL interview (10m20s) at MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: Terran is the race that earns 100% of its wins.

Quote.Author: Nerchio
Quote.Reference: In response to Snute on TL
Quote.Text: Consistency is what makes a player the best and you can't achieve that by not changing.

Quote.Author: Nerchio
Quote.Reference: AcerNerchio as he loses 0-3 to MMA. MMA then goes on to take S3 champion - WCS EU S3 Premier League Ro8
Quote.Text: MMA is back.

Quote.Author: Nerchio
Quote.Reference: 10 minutes into the game as Nerchio faces Stephano in the WCS Europe Season Premier League Season 2 Ro32 Group A
Quote.Text: I already started my ultimate strategy.

Quote.Author: NesTea
Quote.Reference: Proper smack talk before the finals, Blizzcon 2011
Quote.Text: As all zerg players know the Terran race is a scam race. If I were to play Terran I would win championships 10 times over. If MVP played Zerg he wouldn't even get to the doorstep of the finals let alone winning a game.

Quote.Author: NesTea
Quote.Reference: The creator of the universe speaks - Inside look at Korean Starcraft 2 pro-teams P2 (~3:40)
Quote.Text: I practiced non-stop 24 hours once. When you're in that zone you want to ride it out to the end, if you want to be the best then that's what it takes and even that is sometimes not enough. If you start procrastinating there is no question who the loser will be.

Quote.Author: NesTea
Quote.Reference: Advice from coach NesTea - RedBull eSports interview
Quote.Text: You shouldn't be a gamer without passion, it is not just a game. You need to be ambitious and passionate with games.

Quote.Author: NightEnd
Quote.Reference: NightEnD on PvZ, after defeating biGs (Z) in the lower brackets final of SC2WCS European Combined
Quote.Text: If this game is balanced I am queen of England.

Quote.Author: PainUser
Quote.Reference: Casting IPL4, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: Ultralisks at one time were thought to be an extinct species.

Quote.Author: PartinG
Quote.Reference: GSL Up/Down Group C Winners interview -
Quote.Text: I am in a different class when it comes to immortal all-ins. What's different about me than other players is that I put my soul into my plays. My plays are stronger cause I put my soul into them. And because I put my soul into them, I can focus better.

Quote.Author: PartinG
Quote.Reference: PartinG on his Immortal sentry all-in PvZ build - interviewed after winning BWC 2012
Quote.Text: If even Korean players have a hard time blocking this attack, how can a foreigner do it?

Quote.Author: PartinG
Quote.Reference: PartinG when asked about his future - Lo3 E139 (~2:06:00)
Quote.Text: Unless I die, I will play StarCraft forever.

Quote.Author: PartinG
Quote.Reference: Soul-train celebration on twitter after beating Stephano 3-1 in the R012 of the IEM World Championship (Hanover)
Quote.Text: Choo choo, muhfukkas!!!

Quote.Author: PartinG
Quote.Reference: WCS Season 1 Finals Ongamenet TV hype video
Quote.Text: To be honest, Korean players don't pay much attention to foreigners. It's a free win.

Quote.Author: PartinG
Quote.Reference: Reflecting on his win over Rogue after all-killing Jin Air Greenwings in the Round 1 Proleague Playoffs
Quote.Text: It doesn't matter that he scouted, that immortal-sentry all-in is almost impossible to hold anyway.

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: Polt talks about his practice regime at MLG Columbus 2012, TL interview
Quote.Text: I practice 10 hours a day. It's not a lot. Some players practice more than me.

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: Polt drops a motivational bomb during a replay analysis
Quote.Text: What you need to know is, don't give up. Just do your best till you type GG.

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: Polt is the MLG Spring Champion 2013
Quote.Text: Many people say Koreans are imba, but I want to show even though I am not living in Korea in Korean team house I can do it and every foreign player can do it.

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: Fear of the curse before the WCS America S2 finals - on twitter
Quote.Text: Artosis, please don't predict me to win.

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: Polt comments on his recent results at DreamHack Winter
Quote.Text: I think school is taking a toll, but I can't make any excuses. This is my job.

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: Winners-interview after Polt beat Rain 3-2 to advance to the IEM Cologne Final
Quote.Text: Polt: "Protoss so OP." Redeye: "No no no, Protoss easy now!"\nPolt: "It's easy... just for me."

Quote.Author: Polt
Quote.Reference: RedBull Battlegrounds
Quote.Text: Day9: "Polt, who do you fear the most? And you have to pick one person."\nPolt: "Myself."

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: SK gaming Interview
Quote.Text: The truth is foreigners are fucking horrible.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: SK gaming Interview
Quote.Text: Marines counter everything... except the units they don't counter.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: On telling his family about going pro - MLG Summer Championship 2012 interview
Quote.Text: I didn't tell anyone I wanted to do this until I had already done it. It makes things much simpler.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: Discussion on HOTS map pool on State of the Game EP73
Quote.Text: I really don't know why Blizzard has such a hard on for rocks.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: On twitter during WCS S1 Global Finals
Quote.Text: In TvT, all roads lead to Hellbats.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: Nightmare scenario - on twitter
Quote.Text: I just had the scariest thought. What if Goody had swarm hosts.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: TL interview
Quote.Text: Each matchup has its own unique trials that cause frustration, but losing without knowing why you lost and how to improve are consistent across the board.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: Life lessons his career has taught him - reddit AMA
Quote.Text: The balance of life is more important than anything else. If at the bottom you don't want to play, improve, win because of other things going on, you will not do your best. Take care of yourself and then spend the time improving. Not the other way around.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: Terrans suffer at IEM Cologne and all them feels come out
Quote.Text: It's not easy being Terran.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: HyuN vs Pigbaby G3 - WCS America S2 Ro4
Quote.Text: Someone once said: Perfection isn't when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.

Quote.Author: Qxc
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS America S2
Quote.Text:
Apollo: "The oracle now has 18 kills!"
Qxc: "Neighteen? Are you adding an n before eighteen?"
Apollo: "No, that's just my accent."
Qxc: "Well this Oracle has neighteen kills..."

Quote.Author: Rain
Quote.Reference: The KeSPA Protoss speaks up -This is Game TL translation
Quote.Text: I think Zerg is OP. When Zerg players said in interviews that their race was weak, my heart ached.

Quote.Author: Rain
Quote.Reference: Rain on the end of BW - ESFI Interview
Quote.Text: I am heartbroken about it, knowing that the game I have played for all my life is going to disappear.

Quote.Author: Rain
Quote.Reference: Rain comes back from 0-3 vs Last in the OSL Semi-finals Oct 2012
Quote.Text: I'm thankful to the OGN production staff for making this a best of 7 instead of a best of 5 so that I could win.

Quote.Author: Rain
Quote.Reference: Rain wins the first SC2 OSL and reveals his motto (originally from soccer player Lee Young-pho)
Quote.Text: A genius cannot defeat someone who works hard. Someone who works hard cannot defeat someone who enjoys their work.

Quote.Author: Rain
Quote.Reference: After his win over Jjakji in the IEM Cologne Ro8
Quote.Text: I think when you play Protoss you have to be a robot, because you can't afford to make any mistakes

Quote.Author: ReDeYe
Quote.Reference: HerO is the DHW12 champion and the tradition of not being able to open the champagne lives on
Quote.Text: True story, we've never had a champion been able to open the champagne, we're about to find out if HerO's got game.

Quote.Author: ReDeYe
Quote.Reference: From Climbing the Ladder #34
Quote.Text: Just because someone is a casual gamer, it doesn't mean they don't want to win. They're still playing competitively.

Quote.Author: ReDeYe
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Watching Pro League is like watching porn. You really shouldn't enjoy it so much but you can't help watching more.

Quote.Author: ReDeYe
Quote.Reference: On Twitter during Rain vs Solar - WCS Korea S1 Ro32 Group A
Quote.Text: Swarm hosts. About as welcome as a fart in a spacesuit.

Quote.Author: ReDeYe
Quote.Reference: Valentines themed opening for IEM Cologne
Quote.Text: Roses are red, violets are blue, I may not have a Valentine, but I got Starcraft 2.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: Interview at Home Story Cup IV,
Quote.Text: No more beer. I am more professional than I used to be.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: Trolling Grubby on Team Liquid
Quote.Text: Bitches know me, I'm Jos 'LiquidRet' de Kroon. I drink, smoke and don't exercise.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: On PvZ while streaming ladder, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: I'm gonna try to go Muta this game. I'm getting bored of winning with only roaches.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: Grubby wins #SC2WCS Netherlands over Ret
Quote.Text: I've lost to his build 6 times and it just happened again. I am getting a little desperate at this point.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: On skill vs will at the pro-level - Team Acer Grilled interview (~44:35)
Quote.Text: Whatever it is, there is something more than skill to this game.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: Balance utopia - LiquidRet on twitter
Quote.Text: Maybe balance is a utopia we can never fully reach with 3 races so diverse.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: On ZvZ - streaming ladder
Quote.Text: ZvZ is a game of being focused 100% of the time and it's hard to be 100% focused all the time.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: On META EP16 (EU edition)
Quote.Text: If people understood Starcraft the same way we all do, everybody would love Starcraft 2.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: On Meta EP20
Quote.Text: My whole race doesn't have Force Fields ... it's really hard.

Quote.Author: Ret
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: If you have a weak bladder forget becoming a SC2 pro. Going to the bathroom during tournament games not possible.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Any caster who says that being a caster is harder than a player is full of !

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Kiev, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: When you wonder how to kill something the answer is always 4 gate.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Rotti goes to Vegas, Casting NASL S3, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: I went to Vegas and I brought quite a bit of money to buy a nice watch. I came back with no money and no watch.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: DTs are out, casting NASL S3 Week 8 Division 3
Quote.Text: I think it's one of the most beautiful moments in the game when Zerg has no detection.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: In stream chat after losing a few PvZs
Quote.Text: Let's just say I get more girls than I beat Zerg.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting HSC5,
Quote.Text: If you try to play safe against everything, you will eventually end up a little bit behind against everything.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting SC2WCS Ukraine/Russia
Quote.Text: Slivko is a beast in many aspects of life, not only Starcraft.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Nerchio rolling 4 terrans at NASL-KOTH
Quote.Text: From now on I'll be calling this "Nerchio's ZvT practice for money".

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Huk vs Suppy G1 SC2WCS NA Finals at MLG Raleigh
Quote.Text: Crouching probe, hidden pylon.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting NASL S4 Qualifiers
Quote.Text: If I had to be religious I'd believe in roaches.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Heard for the first time during HSC5 (Jul 2012) but also partially busted during Taeja vs MC NASLS4 (Oct 2012)
Quote.Text: There ain't no party like a Protoss party, everybody knows that. I once hung out with a few Zergs, worst night of my life.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Bly vs Mana - DHW12
Quote.Text: First world Zerg problems: my injects are too good, I can't transfuse.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Team Acer Grilled interview (~8:22)
Quote.Text: Most Grand Master league players know more about the game than any caster.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Rotti on twitter during Eve (P) vs Aphrodite (T), Azubu vs StarTale, GSTL 2013 Pre-season
Quote.Text: Found the woman of my dreams. Attractive female playing sc2 going for the void ray all in. Just MARRY ME already.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Pickup lines on Rotterdam's replay hour (~1:07:25)
Quote.Text: If you ever know a girl who's into bad boys you go to her and say: I heard you like bad boys? I play PvT Nexus first, no scout.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Alive vs Revival G3 - WCS 'MMURICA Finals
Quote.Text: We all know what always happens right before Zergs wait for Ultralisks Ben, they somehow lose 3 bases.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting PandaTank vs Stephano - Home Story Cup VII Day2
Quote.Text: Going immortal all-in without your immortals is usually not a good thing to do.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Innovation vs Taeja - WCS S2 Global Finals
Quote.Text: Innovation holds again - he should have died like 9 times, every cat would be dead by now!

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS America S3 Ro32 Group B
Quote.Text: Jaedong is the king of Mindgames in ZvZ. He rolls the dice but he always wins. If I'm ever in Vegas with Jaedong I'm playing craps all day.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Dear wins WCS S3 Finals
Quote.Text: MrBitter: "What would you call it if someone won WCS KR, WCS S3 Finals, and then went on to win blizzcon?"\nRotterdaM: "I'd probably call it a Dear if he does it."

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Happy vs Jjakji at HSC VIII
Quote.Text: You know you're rich when you're securing a Xel'Naga Watchtower with a Mule.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Streaming Ladder
Quote.Text: It's important that you play what you enjoy, not what you think is best.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Scarlett vs Masa G3 in the WCS America Ro32
Quote.Text: The spire is such a small building when it starts, but it has such deadly consequences.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS
Quote.Text: The cheesiest thing a macro player can do is pretend he wants to cheese, then play a macro game.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: On timings - casting Puck vs Hyun during the WCS America Ro16
Quote.Text: I always say, better late than never, but never late is better.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS America Ro8 - Arthur vs Oz
Quote.Text: This is PvP in all its glory guys - We have proxy DTs against a proxy Stargate.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Team WCS America vs Team WCS Europe 3v3 showmatch
Quote.Text: In the past I haven't played a lot of 3v3 games but, it's surprisingly fun when Revival and Taeja are your teammates. The only bad thing is, you can never really blame them, cause when you lose it's probably because you're the weakest link.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Stephano vs Petreaus ZvZ - Lone Star Clash 3
Quote.Text: I don't think this PC can handle this many free units.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Lone Star Clash 3
Quote.Text: That's the beauty of working for a company that went bankrupt, I can't be fired! I'm already unemployed!

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting Iaguz vs Nestea G1 WCS AM Challenger
Quote.Text: Nestea believes in the power of the Muta like some people believe in a thing called love.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS America Season 2 Ro32 Group C
Quote.Text: Up next it's another USA vs Korea series, it's Puck vs Violet... who am I kidding, it's basically America all the way.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: Casting NA Qualifier #1 for RedBull Battlegrounds Santa Monica
Quote.Text: State has a 100% win record when he pulls his Probes, let's see if he can make it 200%.

Quote.Author: RotterdaM
Quote.Reference: A very tired Rotti at IEM
Quote.Text: I have a feeling, and when I have a feeling, sometimes I'm right. I'm usually not. Most of the time I'm wrong. I've made a career out of being wrong. It's awesome.

Quote.Author: Scarlett
Quote.Reference: First version of the HotS beta hits the community
Quote.Text: I'm impressed by HotS so far. Didn't think it was possible to make a unit [warhound] stronger than marines.

Quote.Author: Scarlett
Quote.Reference: Casting HSC VIII
Quote.Text: [The Swarm Host] is kind of fun... your units just don't die, it feels like you're playing Protoss or something.

Quote.Author: Scarlett
Quote.Reference: HSC VIII
Quote.Text: You lose 100% of the ladder games you never play.

Quote.Author: Scarlett
Quote.Reference: After winning vs Stardust in the NorthCon Ro8
Quote.Text: Recently I had trouble vs Protoss so I decided to not fight them and just to destroy their bases.

Quote.Author: Scarlett
Quote.Reference: Scarlett switches to Protoss to tie the series vs DRG at MLG
Quote.Text: Day9: "Are you going to play Protoss?"\nScarlett: "No. But I got a good PvP build.. It's a possibility I guess."

Quote.Author: SeleCT
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: I don't care about the score, I can go 0-10. If I practice I will get better.

Quote.Author: SeleCT
Quote.Reference: Korean DNA - RedBull eSports interview
Quote.Text: I don't believe that Korean DNA makes you play better StarCraft 2. I believe that if any of pro-players practice in the Korea server, they can be a top player.

Quote.Author: SeleCT
Quote.Reference: The difference between the SC2 and Dota2 competitive scenes - Dignitas interview
Quote.Text: [In Dota2] as long as you find teammates that you really like, it will go well. In SC2 you just play on your own, so you can't blame anyone but yourself.

Quote.Author: SeleCT
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: I was playing Hearthstone... Mom comes into my room and said: "Are you gambling? Gambling is bad. Don't". LOL

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Snute on starting off as a pro-gamer - Snute joins TL interview
Quote.Text: When you start off as a pro-gamer it's all about putting yourself in a stable and comfortable position where you can let go and give it your all for a given time, and then re-evaluate.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: When asked balance questions in stream chat
Quote.Text: I don't know if Zerg is strong in HotS. The strength of the race depends on the player. That's all.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Macro tips on twitter
Quote.Text: Zerg macro-tip: when under pressure, feeling stressed, big army inbound: make Overlords. You will want units, not supply blocks.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Snute wins ESET UK Masters i48 - Fast Expand interview
Quote.Text: Preparation is really powerful if you use it right. If you overcommit too much to specialize to your opponent then you're at risk.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Pro-gamer dating tips on twitter
Quote.Text: If you're a girl and you want to date me first you need to mass roaches.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: RedBull eSports interview
Quote.Text: No matter how genius a strategy might be in someone's head, it is likely to lose straight up to something simple.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Snute post on TL after WCS NA premier league qualifier
Quote.Text: With time, anything is possible. Even to fix the most broken mind, even to overcome the greatest learning difficulties, to improve and have awareness. Maybe then I will be gosu. If I'm not, then well, at least I will be happy.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: FFA tactics at the Dustin Expo March Madness
Quote.Text: Demuslim: "Was the idea from the start of the game that you guys are gonna team up and do as best as you can?"\nSnute: "You have to do it like in the Hunger Games Movie. You need to team up first and then you kill each other."

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Rivalry exposed - Winners interview after the TL vs Acer March Madness Free-For-All
Quote.Text: Rotterdam: "Normally when a Free-For-All happens most people have a plan: I'm gonna defend, I'm gonna do this, I'm gonna expand... you had one plan and that was Kill Nerchio and take it from there."\nSnute: "Whenever I do well in Starcraft, Nerchio is the first one to flame me, so I just wanted to kill him."

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: The best part about losing on ladder is winning in tournaments.

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: Nerchio vs Stephano - WCS Europe Season Premier League Season 2 Ro32 Group A
Quote.Text: Are YOU in a great economic position? Up one base? Want to finish off your opponent, but dont know how? Call Dr. Roach TODAY! 512-MASS-ROACH

Quote.Author: Snute
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: The key to great mechanics in SC2 is not about being fast as much as it is about spending attention in the right places at the right time.

Quote.Author: Socke
Quote.Reference: On SOTG #69
Quote.Text: Sometimes you play better when you're hungover.

Quote.Author: Socke
Quote.Reference: Socke wins the German SC2WCS
Quote.Text: Soe: 'How does it feel to be the German champion?' \nSocke: 'Well, I am kind of used to it.'

Quote.Author: Socke
Quote.Reference: Socke drops some wisdom - interview at HSCVI (~37:00)
Quote.Text: Almost all matches even at the pro level are decided by silly mistakes one of the players makes. It's not even about balance, it's about who fucks up first.

Quote.Author: Soulkey
Quote.Reference: WCS S1 Global Finals - OGN Lounge Interview
Quote.Text: If you want to pick up a girl, never mention Starcraft.

Quote.Author: StarDust
Quote.Reference: DH Summer 2013 champion on Lo3 EP163
Quote.Text: Before DreamHack I am really good Korean player but after DreamHack I am like star. Amazing.

Quote.Author: StarDust
Quote.Reference: Epic post-game analysis - WCS Europe Ro16
Quote.Text: Tod: "I really like this move you make here."\nStardust: "It was mistake."

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Hatch in the middle of the map with spines, Home Story Cup IV, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: It's like planetary fortress.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: After winning IPL showmatch vs WhiteRa, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: I don't think about it, I just know what to do and when to do it.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Don't copy all of my builds, 4 evochambers is a really bad idea.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: On Live On Three E108
Quote.Text: They keep saying I am not the best but I keep winning more money.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Pre-game interview Stephano vs Parting, RedBull Battlegrounds (Austin)
Quote.Text: Day9: 'What are your predictions for this match?'\nStephano: 'Stupid question.'

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano on his drunken shenanigans, GD Couch DreamHack Summer 2012
Quote.Text: They can't really punish me, 'cause I am the best.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano wins NASL S3
Quote.Text: Stephano's back.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano on the MLG extended series rule, Lo3 E124
Quote.Text: I don't mind the extended series as I am usually the one who's coming from the winners bracket.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano drops only 1 map on his way to the winners finals - SC2WCS EU 2012
Quote.Text: ReDeYeS: "what about the EG Curse?"\nStephano: "it's bullshit."

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano is the SC2WCS EU Champion 2012
Quote.Text: SeltzerPlease: "so what does this mean for you?"\nStephano: "more money to the bank, I guess."

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano keeps trolling everyone and is the Lone Star Clash 2 champion (quote from interview after beating Crank)
Quote.Text: It's easy. I've always said Zerg is the best race and it remains that way. (...) It's way way imba.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano interviewed after his GSL Up&Down matches (~1:10)
Quote.Text: I think I would play worse without my hair, it's part of my strength.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Interviewed on stage after beating Grubby in Group D - IEM World Championship (Hanover)
Quote.Text: Thinking about the game and understanding the game is better than practicing a lot stupidly.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Post WCS Ro16 Team Acer interview
Quote.Text: I don't like practicing against a specific player because I practice against his specific style and not against the race. When you play ladder you meet many different styles so you can be good against everything.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Widow mines backfire - Stephano vs ForGG, WCS EU Ro4
Quote.Text: I wanted to kill his marines and he made it even better. He put his marines into the medivacs and killed himself. Thanks, I guess.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano retires from pro-gaming - farewell tweet
Quote.Text: Here ends a legend. It has been a great experience. I hope you won't forget me and I'll never forget what you and Starcraft did to me. Bye.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: When I'm angry, I just log on SC2, search a game until a find a protoss and I ruin his life by being the biggest bitch on earth.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Studying is no different from gaming to me. Haven't left home for 6 days now.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: On playing his SwarmHost Style
Quote.Text: Usually I have a cup of tea and my algebra book next to me if the games get to that point where I don't attack, neither my opponent.

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: Starcraft is a cruel world. It tightens my heart to know so many people invest up to 8 hours everyday to earn scrap. That's passion!

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: Stephano makes into WCS Europe Premier Season 2 with an excellent display of SwarmHost play
Quote.Text: I don't know such thing called Honor. Premier League, here I am!

Quote.Author: Stephano
Quote.Reference: When asked if worried about having a tougher time than previous years after advancing to the Ro8 of the Lone Star Clash 3
Quote.Text: It boosts my confidence to know that I'm beating full-time players being retired, I don't see any reasons to feel worried about my level right now.

Quote.Author: Strelok
Quote.Reference: From a TL post
Quote.Text: What are we [non-korean terrans] doing SO WRONG, that we struggle a lot even against non-korean protosses and zergs?

Quote.Author: Taeja
Quote.Reference: Taeja interviewed before winning MLG Summer Arena
Quote.Text: It's gonna be bad for Alicia to make 2nd place again, but I have no choice.

Quote.Author: Taeja
Quote.Reference: From the article The Liquid Advantage: TaeJa vs Bomber
Quote.Text: People often say that they have momentum after winning many games in a row, but I don't feel that way. Momentum isn't important for me. Only skill.

Quote.Author: Taeja
Quote.Reference: Taeja wins ASUSROG Summer 2012
Quote.Text: I have to admit Terran is not that bad.

Quote.Author: Taeja
Quote.Reference: The humble champion, ESFI interview after winning DHVLC
Quote.Text: I have not won a GSL yet so it's difficult to consider myself a strong Terran.

Quote.Author: Taeja
Quote.Reference: Taeja advances to Code S from Up and Downs, ThisIsGame interview translation, GSL S1 2013 Up and Downs Group B
Quote.Text: I wasn't supposed to be in Up and Downs in the first place. Code S is where I belong.

Quote.Author: Taeja
Quote.Reference: Taeja is the DH Open Summer champion - on twitter
Quote.Text: 17-1 finish dreamhack. I lost to champagne.

Quote.Author: TargA
Quote.Reference: Casting Nerchio vs DarkHydra G1 - WCS Europe Challenger S2 Group H
Quote.Text: The standard Terran move: If you don't know what to do, load up everything and head for the main base.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: My little precious nerd face shouldn't be exposed to anything but an air conditioner.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: MKP drops manner mules in the final, MLG Winter Arena 2012
Quote.Text: He thinks he's won... has he won?!?

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: On his twitter
Quote.Text: If life is a game, I'm beating it on hard mode before I die.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting at MLG Columbus, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Tasteless: 'Oh my god, thats a bit of an... Artosis pylon there.'\nArtosis: 'I cant believe you just said that to me at MLG!'

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting at MLG Columbus, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: You can't play Starcraft with a clenched fish.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: After TheSTC beat DRG, GSL Code S RO32, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: TheSTC is so sick, we could call him TheSTD. Cause that's sick.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: On Huk's scouting probe shift-move patterns, GSL, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: If I was a progamer, I would draw penises.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG Spring Arena #1
Quote.Text: If someone asks you which country you're from, he's cheesing you.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Day9 wins WCG USA 2005 (Broodwar)
Quote.Text: Zerg is a race you gotta keep under control and, you know, Sean is an out of control guy.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Tastosis pylon, Casting MLG Spring Championship 2012
Quote.Text: That's a Tastosis pylon right there, the Tasteless pylon backing up the Artosis pylon, everything's gonna be fine.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Competitive spirit, casting SC2WCS UK 2012
Quote.Text: It's not about playing the perfect game, it's about winning.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: On learning Korean, Real Talk EP08
Quote.Text: The more you study a language the more you realize you suck at it. It's just like Starcraft.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting MC vs Seed (PvP) GSL S3 Code S Finals
Quote.Text: There is this thing in PvP that we see very rarely called 'late-game'.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Cologne
Quote.Text: You're a sub-human if you don't like Starcraft.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: The zombie possum - casting VortiX vs MVP (3-2) at IEM Cologne
Quote.Text: VortiX, man, he's like a possum, you think he's dead then he gets up and kills you. That's not like a possum, it's like a zombie possum. That's the worst kind of possum. Read a book about it once.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: On Nerchio's domination in group play at IEM Cologne
Quote.Text: I'm not Tasteless, I'm Speechless.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Taeja vs Leenock - Ro8 GSL Code S S4 2012
Quote.Text: My new style of commentary, any time a guy tries to do an all in I'm going to yell: YOLO!

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Classic Tasteless from WCG 2006
Quote.Text: If you guys think doing BMX tricks on a bike is hard then you guys haven't played StarCraft yet.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: SC2 Game of Thrones - RorO vs Happy G1, Ro32 GSL Code S S5 2012
Quote.Text: When you play the GSL of Thrones, either you win or you go to Code A.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Tasteless turns into Speechless once again for a fairly horrid G2 between Innovation and Squirtle, Ro32 GSL Code S S5 Group G 2012
Quote.Text: You know those super religious people that say they saw the statue of the Virgin Mary cry tears of blood? She probably was watching that game.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Brothers cast brothers, Tasteless and Day9 cast LucifroN vs VortiX - Ro16 BWC 2012
Quote.Text: Day9: "Nick is actually casting with a busted rib right now, which is why I am trying hard not to be funny."\nTasteless: "It's OK. I'm on a bunch of painkillers right now, so I'm feeling totally groovy."

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: On the shifting trend from TvT to ZvZs at IPL5 Day3 -
Quote.Text: I got 2 PhDs in TvT man, you should've seen last year.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Squirtle vs Nerchio in the GSLWC Finals - IPL5 Day3
Quote.Text: Carriers. Haven't seen one of these in a long time. The flying paper-weights of StarCraft 2.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Innovation vs Taeja G1 - 2013 GSL S1 Code S, Ro16, Group A
Quote.Text: A marine army is really only worth as much as the medivacs it has around.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: The importance of StarCraft (full chat-log), casting MC vs. Curious G2 - 2013 GSL S1 Code S, Ro16, Group C
Quote.Text: SC2 is basically somewhere in between the importance of penicillin and the flushing toilet. It's up there.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: On observers - WCS Oceania finals (12-Aug-2012)
Quote.Text: In-game observing is actually incredibly difficult to do. You're basically like a futuristic cameraman in a video game trying to capture the right moments at the right time and show the audience.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Taeja vs Fantasy - WCS Korea Season 1 Ro32 Group D
Quote.Text: Everything you do in life is easier if you grew up on the streets of Brood War.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: After Flash 2-0ed Soulkey to advance 4-0 in his group - WCS Korea Season 1 Ro32 Group H
Quote.Text: Flash is like an over-clocked human.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Life vs Leenock - WCS Korea Ro32 Group G
Quote.Text: Fighting games make people violent just like sports games make people better athletes.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Bomber vs Shine G1 - WCS Korea Ro16
Quote.Text: Shine is between a rock and a hard place but I guess you could say between a terran army and widow mines, it's about the same thing.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Flash vs Bbyong - WCS Korea Ro16 day 5
Quote.Text: If you don't know who Flash is, you've been living under a rock for the last ten years of eSports.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS S3 Korea Challenger
Quote.Text: Usain Bolt is the fastest man in the world, has he won a GSL? No, he hasn't even come close!

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting casting DRG vs Innovation WCS Korea Premier S3 R032
Quote.Text: DRG is the sickest Zerg ... he might be the mayor of Sick City.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS Korea GSL Premier Group G S3
Quote.Text: What was the Starcraft unit that talked the least? The Mute-alisk.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Starcraft tattoos - WCS Korea S3 Ro16
Quote.Text: I have an Artosis face on my butt.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: GSL
Quote.Text: Maru is the mayor of Sick City, but Classic is the Batman, the superhero guarding Sick City.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Season 1
Quote.Text: Tasteless: "My spirit animal is the Sloth."\nArtosis: "My spirit animal is the Tasteless."

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting DH Open
Quote.Text: We call North Americans "casters".

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting the GSL Ro32 Group F
Quote.Text: I feel like SuperNova is the Bear Grylls of the Ro32 - It's like he's eating raw fish and drinking his own urin to get through this.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Ro32 Group H
Quote.Text: Tasteless: "Leenok is investing heavily in the late game."\n Artosis: "He does have 99 drones..." Tasteless: "... and a bitch ain't one."

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting Maru vs Stork - GSL Season 2 Round of 16 Group C
Quote.Text: Maru is so based he had two bases, his base and Stork's base.

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: As Maru lifts his CC at the start of the game to fly to the gold base on Habitation Station - Casting Maru vs Stork - GSL Season 2 Round of 16 Group C
Quote.Text: I don't care about anybody else when Maru's CC lifts I touch myself!

Quote.Author: Tasteless
Quote.Reference: Casting sOs vs Solar - GSL Season 2
Quote.Text: That was more one-sided than a Moebius strip, man.

Quote.Author: TempO
Quote.Reference: Some make songs, some make websites to aggregate quotes - When I'm Grandmaster lyrics
Quote.Text: Placed into bronze, it was so wrong. No games I won, so I made songs.

Quote.Author: TempO
Quote.Reference: Life lessons playing ladder
Quote.Text: There are a few life tips I can give you guys: 1) Stay in school. 2) Don't do drugs and 3) Don't get supply blocked. Follow these things in life and you'll be a successful individual.

Quote.Author: TempO
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Only 2 things in life are certain: death, and the fact that you spawn with 6 workers in Starcraft.

Quote.Author: Thorzain
Quote.Reference: At the end of a 60 minutes long game vs Stephano, SHOUTcraft Invitational 4 Finals, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Slowly, but steadily.

Quote.Author: Thorzain
Quote.Reference: MLG 2011
Quote.Text: People say that I can't play when I havent prepared for a week but... that's just bullshit.

Quote.Author: Thorzain
Quote.Reference: An offer you can't refuse, Thorzain joins team EG
Quote.Text: They offered me things that would let me take at least one more year off from school, without feeling bad about it.

Quote.Author: Thorzain
Quote.Reference: Not everyone likes the queen range increase
Quote.Text: Queens are ridiculous.

Quote.Author: Thorzain
Quote.Reference: Thorzain on his practice regime, Lo3 #125
Quote.Text: I made a rule for myself when I practice with Koreans. I wouldn't stop playing until they stop.

Quote.Author: Thorzain
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: I like to think that my immune system fighting intruders is like a TvZ.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Interview at MLG Columbus, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: If I was a vampire you would look in the mirror and you wouldn't see a face, only a beard.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: In game chat during 3rd/4th place ONOG i2 finals vs Sheth, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: ZvZ. The reason this game is not for kids. Cause it promotes gambling.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Liquid gets all-killed by ZeNEX.Life, GSTL Season 2 2012
Quote.Text: Some may call it a All-Kill how about we just say it was a team bonding experience?

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: To MrBitter for messing up flags of European countries, HSC5 Day1, July 2012
Quote.Text: Americans should not be allowed to talk about geography.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Casting Idra vs Moon at ASUSROG Summer 2012
Quote.Text: Idra is the most buffed of the smaller Starcraft 2 players.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: I am the kind of guy who stutter steps Zerglings versus destructible rocks and gets supply blocked while doing it.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: TLO gets knocked out by Hero at DHVLC 2012, Cadred interview
Quote.Text: People talk about the EG curse but the Liquid curse is that we always team-kill each other.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Competitive mindset - Cadred interview at ESET UK Masters
Quote.Text: If you stop thinking about winning you might as well quit.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Gamer instinct - twitter
Quote.Text: You know you're a gamer when you redirect a cup of hot tea towards your body mid-fall to protect your gear.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Before TLO vs NesTea (2-1) - RedBull Training Grounds
Quote.Text: ZvZ is all over the place. You gotta feel it out if you can't plan it.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: Pro-tips on twitter
Quote.Text: Pro-tip: when at tournaments and you meet another pro-gamer at the urinals. Stand next to him to show your dominance.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: BM S&M - casting ATC finals
Quote.Text: I have a like a perversed pleasure I take out of people BMing me. If someone leaves without a GG that's like the best thing anybody could do to me.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: TLO after losing to SK.MC in Fragbite Masters during the pizza.gg teamswap
Quote.Text: I swear to god units do less damage when you're in EG.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: TLO casting at Seat Story Cup
Quote.Text: TLO: "My haircut is more Berlin and yours is more Cologne."\nApollo: "Oh really?" TLO: "No I'm a caster, I'm just making stuff up."

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: DH Open
Quote.Text: Life is so good at making his opponent make mistakes 'cause he is constantly punching you in the face.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: WCS S2
Quote.Text: Me and Snute we are changing each other. At some point we're going to be an unbeatable Archon of Zerg philosophy.

Quote.Author: TLO
Quote.Reference: WCS S2
Quote.Text: Protoss players don't play together, they just argue with each other who's more imbalanced.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Casting Stephano vs Hero on youtube (~12:00)
Quote.Text: 65 drones Zerg is actually an all-in.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: On the difference between the WC3 and SC2 pro-scenes - Team Acer interview (~25:30)
Quote.Text: You could play the same strategy for years and still be one of the best players in the world in WC3. In SC2 you can do the same strategy for two games and you're going to be crushed by one of the top players, just because he's going to completely counter you.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Socke vs Kas G5 analysis - Ro8 IEM Katowice 2013
Quote.Text: 3 is the magic number. I am not talking about relationships or intercourse, but Colossus.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Whining rights - On SOTG EP92 (~15:45)
Quote.Text: When you're a player, if your race wins you're happy but if the other race wins you get the whining rights.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: ToD ladder analysis
Quote.Text: There is no such thing as a direct hardcounter that you should always lose to, there's always something to be found, something you can do.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Casting IEM Singapore
Quote.Text: When there are more Thors than there are Zerglings, you know you are in a good position.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Casting CJ HerO vs Polt - IEM Sao Paulo
Quote.Text: This build should have a health warning: WARNING This build should not be tried on ladder.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Jjakji roasting Snute's drones in the WCS Europe Ro16
Quote.Text: Jjakji was homesick, he wanted some Korean BBQ so he made it himself!

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: As MouzVortix wins over MVP in the WCS Europe Ro16
Quote.Text: Knock knock, who's there? Cucaracha! 10 Zerglings!

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Casting Arthur vs TooDming - WCS America Ro16
Quote.Text: Three void rays are about to come out and make sweet love to these roaches.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: ToD introducing the WCS Europe Grand Final between MC and MMA
Quote.Text: You can see these players be really friendly outside of the game and before it takes place, but once the game begins, there's no friendship, nothing, just winning, that's the only thing that matters.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Casting HSC IX
Quote.Text: *Destiny: "I think I'm the best zerg in the midwest."\nToD: "I'm not even sure you're the best zerg in your own building."

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: Casting MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: It's like Deja Vu all over again. That's how you say it. Cuz I'm french.

Quote.Author: ToD
Quote.Reference: TL interview (0m5s) at MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: I have a secret to tell you: I search TOD every day on Team Liquid.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Thorzain vs DarkForce, SHOUTcraft Invitational 4, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: Thorzain doesn't win games, he destroys minds.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: LiquidJesus and the baneling holocaust vs TSLPolt, ASUSROG Assembly Winter 2012
Quote.Text: That's not a baneling bust, that's a baneling holocaust.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Huk (P), down 1 game vs Heart (T), goes proxy gate pressure (final 1-2 for Heart), MLG Spring Arena #2
Quote.Text: I'm surprised Huk can move so easily with balls that big.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Design flaw, casting ShoutCraft Invitational 4, Jan 2012
Quote.Text: What kind of engineer designed a seeker missile that can be outrun by a drone?

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Casting Life vs Flash - MLG Dallas 2012
Quote.Text: I'm quite surprised they didn't have to expand the booth to accomodate Flash's balls.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Bomber takes 2nd at Lone Star Clash 2 in a great final series against Stephano
Quote.Text: Bomber's Best is an ale that I would drink.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Casting Mind vs Argo on Kespa Arkanoid - KT vs 8th Set3 / 2012-2013 Proleague
Quote.Text: It is literally impossible to rush on this map, it actually cannot be done because of the number of rocks this map has. It is a Dustin Browder resort paradise.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Casting HelloKitty vs Suppy SHOUTcraft America 2013 Group C
Quote.Text: Trying to do damage to roaches with an oracle is like trying to tickle a bear, it doesn't get you anywhere other than horribly mauled very very quickly.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: TB on twitter
Quote.Text: Be a caster if you want your choice in suits critiqued by guys in their underwear, it's one of the perks of the job.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: The american hope, Polt - ongamers interview
Quote.Text: [...] the guy most American fans root for as the 'American hope' is a Korean on a student visa.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: It's not necessary to post that the other race is op every time a foreigner lose. It cheapens the accomplishments of both players.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: On twitter during DH Winter
Quote.Text: Life never researches Adrenal Glands, he was born with it.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: THE PERFECT STRATEGY. Forget all your tech, build 9 barracks and kill him.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: On the Shoutcraft Qualifier show
Quote.Text: Watching Starcraft is like watching 10 games of chess on crack.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: As seen on reddit
Quote.Text: SC2 will live even if I have to support the entire scene with my erect penis.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Totalbiscuit on Arthur advancing over Bomber in the WCS America Group D Winner's Match
Quote.Text: Well it's unfortunate that a popular Terran lost to a lesser known Protoss. The fallout is as predictable as you can imagine [...] I hate this situation just like I hated Broodlord/Infestor. Good players of the OP race get no credit for their wins. It benefits nobody.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: TotalBiscuit's thoughts on the state of SC2 on SoudnCloud
Quote.Text: You realize why people are pissed about Protoss right now? You realize why people are pissed about the state of the eSports? It's because they actually give a shit.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Casting Liquid.Snute vs MVP.Keen on the map Wrecking Ball - ShoutCraft Clan Wars
Quote.Text: TB: "Are you actually trying to analyze this map, or just trying to come up with build orders for the next time you play on it?"\nQxc: "IT HAS A NEUTRAL REACTOR!"

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Casting SunDisk SHOUTcraft
Quote.Text: If esports needed saving, and I don't believe it does, then this game would be there to do just that.

Quote.Author: TotalBiscuit
Quote.Reference: Casting SunDisk SHOUTcraft
Quote.Text: The 3rd base is a lie!

Quote.Author: Tumba
Quote.Reference: Casting at MLG Columbus, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Queens make for phenomenal punching bags.

Quote.Author: Tumba
Quote.Reference: Casting ONOG i2, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Absolutely. That's one of the words you say when you didn't listen to what your co-caster said, and you just hope he said something right.

Quote.Author: Tumba
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: I have lost plenty of $$ playing poker. Never raged like I do with StarCraft. Probably because poker is actually balanced.

Quote.Author: Tumba
Quote.Reference: Tumba recalls interviewing MC at MLG - interview on The Starcast E122
Quote.Text: If you ask me: what was more exciting for you, interviewing MC or proposing? On air I have to say proposing.

Quote.Author: Tyler
Quote.Reference: Lone Star Clash Invitational, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: Ain't no foreigner gonna come to Texas and show me up. There can be only one victor in the Lone Star Clash and you can bet the ranch it's gonna be me.

Quote.Author: Tyler
Quote.Reference: Nuke dodging - Trial of the Xel'Naga Day 1 (RBLan)
Quote.Text: The nukes can't catch me because I'm the gingerbread protoss.

Quote.Author: Tyler
Quote.Reference: Play for the right reasons - Gamespot interview (~1:10)
Quote.Text: You have to play for yourself, you have to play to get better, you can't play to make other people happy, that's not gonna ever sustain you.

Quote.Author: Tyler
Quote.Reference: SotG Christmas episode
Quote.Text: Keep loving StarCraft and StarCraft will keep loving you.

Quote.Author: Vibe
Quote.Reference: Vibe wins SC2WCS US at MLG Anaheim 2012
Quote.Text: Clutch: 'How are you going to prepare for your next tournament?'\nVibe: 'LOTS of Diablo 3!'

Quote.Author: viOLet
Quote.Reference: On the level of play across regions, Lo3 #104
Quote.Text: Korean is high, European is middle and America is... yes.

Quote.Author: viOLet
Quote.Reference: IEM Hanover interview
Quote.Text: Starcraft is practice important, but mind game is more important. I just practice my mind.

Quote.Author: viOLet
Quote.Reference: Violet is the MLG Spring Arena #2 champion
Quote.Text: In ZvZ, I just trust my luck.

Quote.Author: viOLet
Quote.Reference: Violet (Z) in the pre-game interview before the finals vs Leenock (Z) - IPL5 Day4
Quote.Text: Sorry for ZvZ final.

Quote.Author: VortiX
Quote.Reference: After advancing to the WCS Ro8, beating MMA & MVP without dropping a map
Quote.Text: Don't play mind games with Spanish people.

Quote.Author: VortiX
Quote.Reference: Mouz.Vortix after advancing to the WCS Europe RO8
Quote.Text: Even if my performance lately has been really good, I don't want to say "I'm the best and I can beat anybody" - I mean, I have to convince myself that I can beat everybody, but if you ask objectively I wouldn't say I have like a 90% chance of winning, or even 50%.

Quote.Author: WaxAngel
Quote.Reference: On twitter, as GSL has one of the longest Up&Downs sessions ever up to the 3rd tiebreaker - GSL S1 2013
Quote.Text: This is what the Up/Downs are supposed to be like. The winners aren't supposed to feel happiness - just relief...

Quote.Author: WaxAngel
Quote.Reference: WaxAngel during his interview with TLO (~13:57)
Quote.Text: Whenever we talk about the tournaments, no one watches the videos. All of our highest hits videos on TL are Hot_Bid talking about random ass shit.

Quote.Author: WaxAngel
Quote.Reference: WaxAngel on twitter during TLO vs Bomber in the IEM Sao Paulo Ro8
Quote.Text: Here we see the burrowed baneling in its natural habitat, hunting its favorite prey, the Bomber.

Quote.Author: WaxAngel
Quote.Reference: On twitter after KT.Zests win over SKT.soO in the GSL Season 1 Finals
Quote.Text: KT Rolster so good at throwing people in the air compared to other teams. Must be all that Proleague winning experience.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Star Nation teaser, MLG Anaheim
Quote.Text: When I starting play I very disappointing and very sad after my lose. If you want to make one goal to win you must lose. You can't win all games. We are people, you make mistake. You're not computer. And if you understand your mistake when you lose you just can make analysis game and continue play try to fix it, and it's no problem. More GG, more skill.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Classic WhiteRa
Quote.Text: We make expand and then defense it.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: After beating Idra with 'special tactics' at IPL3, 2011
Quote.Text: He played well, but you can see special tactics work very well.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: WhiteRa arrives to Canada for his mini-tour, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: We can make some party on terran base or zerg base.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Interview at IPL4
Quote.Text: Starcraft 2 you don't need very high APM, you just need understand the game.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: at IPL4, Apr 2012
Quote.Text: We talk a lot with MC, we make together decision: if Blizzard remove infested marines it's better for balance.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: at IPL4, Mar 2012
Quote.Text: I think Protoss are number 3 race in balance.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: Come back, come back... hmm... Terran not like High Templar.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Streaming ladder
Quote.Text: You drop me nuclear, I destroy expand.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Interview at IPL4
Quote.Text: For good shape you need practice more.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: WhiteRa on why he doesn't like traveling too much, 2GD Couch, DHS2012
Quote.Text: In hotel room you sleep by yourself, but when you sleep with your wife it's much better.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: WhiteRa on twitter during NASL S3 Grand Finals
Quote.Text: Zerg race bad dream for Protoss. I not want sleep anymore.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: WhiteRa tweets about balance
Quote.Text: I think SC2 not so good balance game like SC-BW and here we just spend time in disputes. Very waiting heart of the swarm!

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: WhiteRa vs TLO
Quote.Text: I show Protoss imba.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: NostradamusRa predicts the future on youtube
Quote.Text: StarCraft is game that is close to reality, not only in us life we have many war for resources, in future in space we can see same war but little bit more different stuff, like animals, humanoid, UFO and people fighting each other.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Happy Christmas in the words of WhiteRa, from the final impressions video at HSCVI (~1:20)
Quote.Text: I want wish everybody happy year, merry Christmas, lot of health. It's most of important stuff and not only for yourself and you family and everyone who around you. Best of luck and make something good for people who around you.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: The oracle (no pun intended) has spoken on twitter
Quote.Text: Now game with terran like roulette, where the role of the owner of the casino Terran.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: GosuGamers interview (04-Mar-2013)
Quote.Text: Once you become a pro-gamer, it's for life.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: Pre-emptive GG - on facebook
Quote.Text: I know many protoss fans want use Carriers more often! But the carriers problem it's very, huge investments and a long construction time. Write gg before you get first Carriers.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: On twitter
Quote.Text: I am 33 years old soon and I still play in computer games.

Quote.Author: WhiteRa
Quote.Reference: WhiteRa almost burns down his neighbours house
Quote.Text: I not make expand, but defend neighbors house.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting SC2WCS Korea 2012 with Khaldor
Quote.Text: In sc2 there's no 'Khaldor Arm' upgrade for the phoenix that allows you to lift the nexus.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Bunker rush during Gumiho vs Ragnarok in FXO vs TSL - GSTL S3 2012
Quote.Text: The spine crawlers here no longer useful, they are just annoying the bunkers like that girl that keeps poking on facebook that you don't really know that well.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting Nestea vs Bbyong G1 - GSL Code A, Round2, Day1, Match6
Quote.Text: This is a very forward barracks. This is like asking someone to marry you on the first date barracks. Makes you feel a little bit awkward and uncomfortable and you might pull your drones afterwards.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting Stephano vs MVP G1, IronSquid 2 Group G
Quote.Text: Khaldor: "One-Roach-on-two-Queens action? I'm in for that."\nWolf: "Yeah, I would download that."

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Life is the Blizzard Cup champion over PartinG (4-2) - GSL Blizzard Cup Finals, 22-Dec-2012
Quote.Text: Life is all around us, right now PartinG wishing that were not the case.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting Shine vs. Fantasy G3 - 2013 GSL S1 Code A, Ro32
Quote.Text: Miss the depot and you die, that's actually the game of StarCraft 2, you make one mistake (...) and you lose the game.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: As Violet completes an all-kill vs Leenock, Azubu vs FXO, GSTL 2013 Pre-season Ro4
Quote.Text: Violet is quite fluent in English, but he is also quite fluent in ZvZ.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Pre-game talk before Keen vs Ryung - MVP vs. Axiom/Acer G2 - GSTL 2013 S1
Quote.Text: Being a progamer is not all about being in the booth and playing that game, it is about getting respected by the people that watch your games.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: After sC vs Dear on Fruitland - GSTL match between FXO and SouL
Quote.Text: If life gives you lemons... add 4 barracks and continue Marauder production.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Terran bread and butter
Quote.Text: Medivacs are the butter of the bread and butter of Marine-Medivac.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: The Flash effect - casting ProLeague
Quote.Text: When Flash comes into a tournament, viewer numbers sky-rocket. When he streams people go crazy. All it takes to make anything a 1000 times more exciting in SC2 is just Flash's face on it.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Wolfs Trademark - casting SPL
Quote.Text: You have to respect the Void Rays.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Do'nt let your mother play against Shine
Quote.Text: Here's Shine, a totally nice guy in Person, you put him in the booth, you put him on the keyboard, he totally changes. He will all-in you. If you ask him 'Shine, can you teach my mother how to play Starcraft?', he would 6-pool your mother in her very first Starcraft game and laugh about it.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Soulkey and Reality find themselves in a stalemate after a 2hour 20 minute game - Proleague Round 1 Playoffs
Quote.Text: I'm going to look up the Korean word for Stalemate, because I actually don't know it.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: As Maru pulls out the proxy 11/11 against Hydra in the final game of the day - GSL Ro32 Group F
Quote.Text: Tasteless: "This is a gamble! This isn't even the GSL anymore, this is Vegas baby."\nWolf: "Vegas with micro."

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Parting advances over Classic in the deciding match of Group C in the WCS Korea Ro16
Quote.Text: That wasn't a best of three, that was a best of Parting hit album.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Wolf on MVP Billowy during the Proleague Round 2 Finals - Jin Air Green Wings vs MVP G1
Quote.Text: In [TvP], playing against Billowy is like playing Starcraft while also solving a Rubik's cube. You have to figure out exactly what he's doing, you have to think about all the little pieces of the build he's showing you and if you make one mistake, then he's gonna kill you.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting WCS Korea Code A Season 2 - Soulkey vs Hyvaa
Quote.Text: I feel like Hyvaa is like a sock in the pants drawer.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting TY vs Reality - ProLeague Round 3 Samsung vs KT
Quote.Text: [TY's] army costs more than an entire Apple store.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting Proleague Round 3 Jin Air vs Samsung Galaxy - sOs vs Stork
Quote.Text: What's really coming out of the production tab is a GG.

Quote.Author: Wolf
Quote.Reference: Casting GSL Season 2 Group B - True vs Trap G3
Quote.Text: Artosis: "Whenever these Phoenixes get in range of the Mutas for just a second, at least one of them dies cause... 50 Mutas. That's a lot of damage."\nWolf: "I want a shirt with your face on it that just says: 50 Mutas."

Quote.Author: Xenocider
Quote.Reference: Korean mindset - ITG EP79
Quote.Text: I feel the big thing that separates some Koreans from foreiners is that Koreans play to win and some Foreigners just play not to lose.

Quote.Author: Xenocider
Quote.Reference: On ITG E86
Quote.Text: You really have to have confidence in your play. Half of it is mentality, half of it is skill.

Quote.Author: Xenocider
Quote.Reference: On ITG E90
Quote.Text: If Starcraft 2 was any harder I couldn't do school and Starcraft... so I'm all for deathballs.

Quote.Author: XlorD
Quote.Reference: Pre-event IEM Sao Paulo
Quote.Text: When I start playing fulltime, bye bye Stephano!

Quote.Author: XlorD
Quote.Reference: When asked about EG-TL in Proleague at the ESL Winter Finals
Quote.Text: Everybody adores this Jaedong, I don't even know him. Maybe he's good.

Quote.Author: Yegwen
Quote.Reference: Kaspersky Arena
Quote.Text: Starcraft is not about who's right, it's about who's left.

Quote.Author: Zoran
Quote.Reference: StarCraft without hands
Quote.Text: I don't want to do troll games, I troll them enough when I play without hands.
